anya-e0102n:11_1: Idāni yāsaṃ lokikābhiññānaṃ vasena ayaṃ samādhibhāvanā abhiññānisaṃsāti vuttā,
anya-e0102n:11_2: tā abhiññā sampādetuṃ yasmā pathavīkasiṇādīsu adhigatacatutthajjhānena yoginā yogo kātabbo.
anya-e0102n:11_3: Evañhissa sā samādhibhāvanā adhigatānisaṃsā ceva bhavissati thiratarā ca,
anya-e0102n:11_4: so adhigatānisaṃsāya thiratarāya samādhibhāvanāya samannāgato sukheneva paññābhāvanaṃ sampādessati.
anya-e0102n:12_0: Bhagavatā hi adhigatacatutthajjhānasamādhīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ samādhibhāvanānisaṃsadassanatthañceva uttaruttari
anya-e0102n:12_1: paṇītapaṇītadhammadesanatthañca “so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese
anya-e0102n:12_2: mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte iddhividhāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
anya-e0102n:12_3: So anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”tiādinā nayena iddhividhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:12_7: sattānaṃ cutūpapāte ñāṇanti pañca lokikābhiññā vuttā.
anya-e0102n:13_0: Tattha ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādikaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ kātukāmena ādikammikena yoginā odātakasiṇapariyantesu
anya-e0102n:13_1: aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aṭṭha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā –
anya-e0102n:16_4: tato āpokasiṇeti evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu satakkhattumpi sahassakkhattumpi samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n:17_0: Odātakasiṇato pana paṭṭhāya tatheva paṭilomakkamena samāpajjanaṃ kasiṇapaṭilomaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:18_1: odātakasiṇatopi paṭṭhāya yāva pathavīkasiṇanti evaṃ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ kasiṇānulomapaṭilomaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:19_0: Paṭhamajjhānato pana paṭṭhāya paṭipāṭiyā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:21_1: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānanti evaṃ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ jhānānulomapaṭilomaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:22_0: Pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva tatiyaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n:22_2: tato ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṃ kasiṇaṃ anukkamitvā jhānasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ jhānukkantikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:23_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā puna tadeva tejokasiṇe,
anya-e0102n:23_2: tato lohitakasiṇeti iminā nayena jhānaṃ anukkamitvā kasiṇasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ kasiṇukkantikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:24_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato tejokasiṇe tatiyaṃ,
anya-e0102n:24_2: lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti iminā nayena jhānassa ceva kasiṇassa ca ukkamanaṃ jhānakasiṇukkantikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:25_0: Pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva itaresampi samāpajjanaṃ aṅgasaṅkantikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:26_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tadeva āpokasiṇe…pe…
anya-e0102n:26_1: tadeva odātakasiṇeti evaṃ sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkantikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:27_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā āpokasiṇe dutiyaṃ,
anya-e0102n:27_6: odātakasiṇato nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṃ ekantarikavasena aṅgānañca ārammaṇānañca saṅkamanaṃ aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:28_0: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pana pañcaṅgikanti vavatthapetvā dutiyaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ,
anya-e0102n:28_3: nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṃ jhānaṅgamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ aṅgavavatthāpanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:29_0: Tathā idaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti vavatthapetvā idaṃ āpokasiṇaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:29_1: idaṃ odātakasiṇanti evaṃ ārammaṇamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ ārammaṇavavatthāpanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:29_3: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgatattā addhā taṃ bhāvanāmukhaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0102n:30_1: Imehi pana cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṃ aparidametvā pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko yogāvacaro iddhivikubbanaṃ sampādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
anya-e0102n:30_6: Uppanne nimitte taṃ vaḍḍhetvā appanādhigamo bhāro,
anya-e0102n:30_13: satesu sahassesu vā ekova khippanisantī hoti.
anya-e0102n:30_14: Therambatthale mahārohaṇaguttattherassa gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatesu tiṃsamattesu iddhimantasahassesu upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko rakkhitatthero viya.
anya-e0102n:30_17: sace rakkhito nābhavissa sabbe garahappattā assāma ‘nāgarājānaṃ rakkhituṃ nāsakkhiṃsū’ti.
anya-e0102n:30_18: Tasmā attanā gahetvā vicaritabbaṃ āvudhaṃ nāma malaṃ sodhetvāva gahetvā vicarituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:30_19: Te therassa ovāde ṭhatvā tiṃsasahassāpi bhikkhū khippanisantino ahesuṃ.
anya-e0102n:31_0: Khippanisantiyāpi ca sati parassa patiṭṭhābhāvo bhāro,
anya-e0102n:31_2: giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjāya mārena aṅgāravasse pavattite ākāse pathaviṃ māpetvā aṅgāravassaparittārako thero viya.
anya-e0102n:32_0: Balavapubbayogānaṃ pana buddhapaccekabuddhaaggasāvakādīnaṃ vināpi iminā vuttappakārena bhāvanānukkamena
anya-e0102n:32_1: arahattapaṭilābheneva idañca iddhivikubbanaṃ aññe ca paṭisambhidādibhedā guṇā ijjhanti.
anya-e0102n:32_2: Tasmā yathā piḷandhanavikatiṃ kattukāmo suvaṇṇakāro aggidhamanādīhi suvaṇṇaṃ muduṃ kammaññaṃ katvāva karoti,
anya-e0102n:32_3: yathā ca bhājanavikatiṃ kattukāmo kumbhakāro mattikaṃ suparimadditaṃ muduṃ katvā karoti,
anya-e0102n:32_4: evameva ādikammikena imehi cuddasahākārehi cittaṃ paridametvā chandasīsacittasīsavīriyasīsavīmaṃsāsīsasamāpajjanavasena
anya-e0102n:32_5: ceva āvajjanādivasībhāvavasena ca muduṃ kammaññaṃ katvā iddhividhāya yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0102n:32_6: Pubbahetusampannena pana kasiṇesu catutthajjhānamatte ciṇṇavasināpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0102n:32_8: taṃ vidhiṃ dassento bhagavā “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādimāha.
anya-e0102n:33_4: Iminā paṭhamajjhānādhigamādinā kamena catutthajjhānaṃ paṭilabhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:33_15: Vase vattamānaṃ hi cittaṃ mudunti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:33_18: Muduṃ hi cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti sudantamiva suvaṇṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:33_23: yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ muduñca hoti kammaniyañca,
anya-e0102n:34_3: Mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhite.
anya-e0102n:34_5: Saddhāpariggahitaṃ hi cittaṃ assaddhiyena na iñjati.
anya-e0102n:34_11: Imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:34_12: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya.
anya-e0102n:35_12: Evampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya pādakaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūtanti.
anya-e0102n:37_1: Iddhividhāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetīti ettha ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi,
anya-e0102n:38_6: tassa kho ayaṃ ijjhissati sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā”ti.
anya-e0102n:39_2: Ijjhantīti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:40_2: Sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti ‘bahuko homī”’ti evaṃ vibhajitvā dassitā
anya-e0102n:40_3: iddhi adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannattā adhiṭṭhānā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:41_1: “So pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā…pe…
anya-e0102n:41_2: vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evaṃ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā vikubbanā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:42_1: “Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomaya”nti iminā nayena āgatā iddhi sarīrabbhantare
anya-e0102n:42_2: aññasseva manomayassa sarīrassa nipphattivasena pavattattā manomayā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:43_1: Ñāṇuppattito pana pubbe vā pacchā vā taṃkhaṇe vā ñāṇānubhāvanibbatto viseso ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:43_4: arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti ñāṇavipphārā iddhi.
anya-e0102n:44_0: Tattha āyasmā bākkulo daharova maṅgaladivase nadiyā nhāpiyamāno dhātiyā pamādena sote patito.
anya-e0102n:44_2: Tatra taṃ macchabandho gahetvā seṭṭhibhariyāya vikkiṇi.
anya-e0102n:44_3: Sā macche sinehaṃ uppādetvā ahameva naṃ pacissāmīti phālentī macchakucchiyaṃ suvaṇṇabimbaṃ viya dārakaṃ disvā putto me laddhoti somanassajātā ahosi.
anya-e0102n:44_4: Iti macchakucchiyaṃ arogabhāvo āyasmato bākkulassa pacchimabhavikassa tena attabhāvena paṭilabhitabbaarahattamaggañāṇānubhāvena
anya-e0102n:45_1: Tassā citakaṃ āropetvā sūlehi vijjhitvā jhāpiyamānāya dārako sūlakoṭiyā akkhikūṭe pahāraṃ labhitvā saddaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0102n:45_2: Tato dārako jīvatīti otāretvā kucchiṃ phāletvā dārakaṃ ayyikāya adaṃsu.
anya-e0102n:45_3: So tāya paṭijaggito vuddhimanvāya pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0102n:45_4: Iti vuttanayeneva dārucitakāya arogabhāvo āyasmato saṃkiccassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:46_1: So dārūnaṃ atthāya sakaṭena aṭaviṃ gantvā dārubhāraṃ katvā sāyaṃ nagaradvārasamīpaṃ patto.
anya-e0102n:46_2: Athassa goṇā yugaṃ ossajjitvā nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:46_3: So sakaṭamūle puttakaṃ nisīdāpetvā goṇānaṃ anupadaṃ gacchanto nagarameva pāvisi.
anya-e0102n:46_5: Dārakassa vāḷayakkhānucaritepi bahinagare tiyāmarattiṃ arogabhāvo vuttanayeneva ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:47_1: Samādhito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṃkhaṇe vā samathānubhāvanibbatto viseso samādhivipphārā iddhi.
anya-e0102n:47_2: Vuttañhetaṃ “paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti samādhivipphārā iddhi…pe…
anya-e0102n:47_3: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāya pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti samādhivipphārā iddhi.
anya-e0102n:48_0: Tattha yadā āyasmato sāriputtassa mahāmoggallānattherena saddhiṃ kapotakandarāyaṃ viharato juṇhāya rattiyā
anya-e0102n:48_1: navoropitehi kesehi ajjhokāse nisinnassa eko duṭṭhayakkho sahāyakena yakkhena vāriyamānopi sīse pahāramadāsi.
anya-e0102n:48_2: Yassa meghassa viya gajjato saddo ahosi.
anya-e0102n:48_3: Tadā thero tassa paharaṇasamaye samāpattiṃ appesi.
anya-e0102n:48_4: Athassa tena pahārena na koci ābādho ahosi.
anya-e0102n:49_0: Sañjīvattheraṃ pana nirodhasamāpannaṃ kālakatoti sallakkhetvā gopālakādayo tiṇakaṭṭhagomayāni saṅkaḍḍhetvā aggiṃ adaṃsu.
anya-e0102n:50_1: So aññatarasmiṃ araññe rattiṃ samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdi.
anya-e0102n:50_2: Pañcasatā corā bhaṇḍakaṃ thenetvā gacchantā “idāni amhākaṃ anupathaṃ āgacchantā natthī”ti vissamitukāmā
anya-e0102n:50_3: bhaṇḍakaṃ oropayamānā “khāṇuko aya”nti maññamānā therasseva upari sabbabhaṇḍakāni ṭhapesuṃ.
anya-e0102n:50_4: Tesaṃ vissamitvā gacchantānaṃ paṭhamaṃ ṭhapitabhaṇḍakassa gahaṇakāle kālaparicchedavasena thero vuṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n:50_5: Te therassa calanākāraṃ disvā bhītā viraviṃsu.
anya-e0102n:50_8: Te āgantvā vanditvā theragatena pasādena pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:50_9: Ayamettha pañcahi bhaṇḍakasatehi ajjhotthaṭassa therassa ābādhābhāvo samādhivipphārā iddhi.
anya-e0102n:51_1: Tassā sirimā nāma gaṇikā issāpakatā tattatelakaṭāhaṃ sīse āsiñci.
anya-e0102n:51_3: Telaṃ pokkharapattato udakabindu viya vivaṭṭamānaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0102n:52_1: Māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇo attano dhītāya aggamahesiṭṭhānaṃ patthayamāno tassā vīṇāya āsīvisaṃ pakkhipāpetvā rājānaṃ āha “mahārāja,
anya-e0102n:52_2: sāmāvatī taṃ māretukāmā vīṇāya āsīvisaṃ gahetvā pariharatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:52_3: Rājā taṃ disvā kupito sāmāvatiṃ vadhissāmīti dhanuṃ āropetvā visapītaṃ khurappaṃ sannayhi.
anya-e0102n:52_5: Rājā neva saraṃ khipituṃ na oropetuṃ sakkonto vedhamāno aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n:52_13: Iti rañño saraṃ muñcituṃ avisahanabhāvo sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhīti.
anya-e0102n:53_1: Paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññivihārādikā pana ariyā iddhi nāma. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:53_6: Ayañhi cetovasippattānaṃ ariyānaṃyeva sambhavato ariyā iddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:54_0: Etāya hi samannāgato khīṇāsavo bhikkhu paṭikkūle aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ mettāpharaṇaṃ vā dhātumanasikāraṃ vā karonto appaṭikkūlasaññī viharati.
anya-e0102n:54_1: Appaṭikkūle iṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ asubhapharaṇaṃ vā aniccanti manasikāraṃ vā karonto paṭikkūlasaññī viharati.
anya-e0102n:54_2: Tathā paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlesu tadeva mettāpharaṇaṃ vā dhātumanasikāraṃ vā karonto appaṭikkūlasaññī viharati.
anya-e0102n:54_3: Appaṭikkūlapaṭikkūlesu ca tadeva asubhapharaṇaṃ vā aniccanti manasikāraṃ vā karonto paṭikkūlasaññī viharati.
anya-e0102n:54_4: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hotītiādinā nayena vuttaṃ pana chaḷaṅgupekkhaṃ pavattayamāno paṭikkūle
anya-e0102n:54_5: ca appaṭikkūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjitvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
anya-e0102n:54_7: Aniṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ mettāya vā pharati dhātuso vā upasaṃharatī”tiādinā nayena ayameva attho vibhatto.
anya-e0102n:54_8: Ayaṃ cetovasippattānaṃ ariyānaṃyeva sambhavato ariyā iddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:55_1: Pakkhīādīnaṃ pana vehāsagamanādikā kammavipākajā iddhi nāma. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:55_3: Sabbesaṃ pakkhīnaṃ sabbesaṃ devānaṃ ekaccānaṃ manussānaṃ ekaccānañca vinipātikānaṃ ayaṃ kammavipākajā iddhī”ti.
anya-e0102n:55_4: Ettha hi sabbesaṃ pakkhīnaṃ jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā vināyeva ākāsena gamanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:55_5: Tathā sabbesaṃ devānaṃ paṭhamakappikānañca ekaccānaṃ manussānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:55_6: Tathā piyaṅkaramātā yakkhinī uttaramātā phussamittā dhammaguttāti evamādīnaṃ ekaccānaṃ vinipātikānaṃ ākāsena gamanaṃ kammavipākajā iddhīti.
anya-e0102n:56_1: Cakkavattiādīnaṃ vehāsagamanādikā pana puññavato iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:56_3: Rājā cakkavattī vehāsaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya antamaso assabandhagobandhapurise upādāya.
anya-e0102n:56_9: Saṅkhepato pana paripākaṃ gate puññasambhāre ijjhanakaviseso puññavato iddhi.
anya-e0102n:57_0: Ettha ca jotikassa gahapatissa pathaviṃ bhinditvā maṇipāsādo uṭṭhahi.
anya-e0102n:57_1: Catusaṭṭhi ca kapparukkhāti ayamassa puññavato iddhi.
anya-e0102n:57_3: Ghositassa sattasu ṭhānesu māraṇatthāya upakkame katepi arogabhāvo puññavato iddhi.
anya-e0102n:57_4: Meṇḍakassa ekakarīsamatte padese sattaratanamayānaṃ meṇḍakānaṃ pātubhāvo puññavato iddhi.
anya-e0102n:57_10: Tesu seṭṭhissa sīsaṃ nhātassa ākāsaṃ ullokanakāle aḍḍhateḷasakoṭṭhasahassāni ākāsato rattasālīnaṃ pūrenti.
anya-e0102n:57_11: Bhariyāya nāḷikodanamattampi gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsike parivisamānāya bhattaṃ na khīyati.
anya-e0102n:57_12: Puttassa sahassatthavikaṃ gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsikānampi dentassa kahāpaṇā na khīyanti.
anya-e0102n:57_13: Suṇisāya ekaṃ vīhitumbaṃ gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsikānampi bhājayamānāya dhaññaṃ na khīyati.
anya-e0102n:57_14: Dāsassa ekena naṅgalena kasato ito satta ito sattāti cuddasa maggā honti.
anya-e0102n:59_1: Tena tena pana sammāpayogena tassa tassa kammassa ijjhanaṃ tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:59_2: “nekkhammena kāmacchandassa pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi…pe…
anya-e0102n:59_3: arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhī”ti.
anya-e0102n:59_4: Ettha ca paṭipattisaṅkhātasseva sammāpayogassa dīpanavasena purimapāḷisadisāva pāḷi āgatā.
anya-e0102n:59_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sakaṭabyūhādikaraṇavasena yaṃkiñci sippakammaṃ yaṃkiñci vejjakammaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bedānaṃ
anya-e0102n:59_6: uggahaṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ uggahaṇaṃ antamaso kasanavapanādīni upādāya taṃ taṃ kammaṃ katvā nibbattaviseso
anya-e0102n:59_7: tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhīti āgatā. (10)
anya-e0102n:60_0: Iti imāsu dasasu iddhīsu iddhividhāyāti imasmiṃ pade adhiṭṭhānā iddhiyeva āgatā.
anya-e0102n:61_3: Cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetīti so bhikkhu vuttappakāravasena tasmiṃ citte abhiññāpādake jāte iddhividhādhigamatthāya
anya-e0102n:61_4: parikammacittaṃ abhinīharati kasiṇārammaṇato apanetvā iddhividhābhimukhaṃ peseti.
anya-e0102n:61_12: Tattha ekopi hutvāti iddhikaraṇato pubbe pakatiyā ekopi hutvā.
anya-e0102n:61_13: Bahudhā hotīti bahūnaṃ santike caṅkamitukāmo vā sajjhāyaṃ vā kattukāmo pañhaṃ vā pucchitukāmo hutvā satampi sahassampi hoti.
anya-e0102n:61_15: Iddhiyā catasso bhūmiyo cattāro pādā aṭṭha padāni soḷasa ca mūlāni sampādetvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahanto.
anya-e0102n:62_1: Tattha catasso bhūmiyoti cattāri jhānāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:62_7: Iddhiyā imā catasso bhūmiyo iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasitāya iddhivesārajjāya saṃvattantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:62_8: Ettha ca purimāni tīṇi jhānāni yasmā pītipharaṇena ca sukhapharaṇena ca sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā lahumudukammaññakāyo iddhiṃ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0102n:62_9: tasmā iminā pariyāyena iddhilābhāya saṃvattanato sambhārabhūmiyoti veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:63_3: Idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti. Vīriya… citta…
anya-e0102n:63_7: Ettha ca chandahetuko chandādhiko vā samādhi chandasamādhi.
anya-e0102n:63_11: Samannāgatanti chandasamādhinā ca padhānasaṅkhārehi ca upetaṃ.
anya-e0102n:63_13: ijjhanti etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena iddhīti saṅkhaṃ gatānaṃ abhiññācittasampayuttānaṃ
anya-e0102n:64_11: Iti ayañca chando ayañca chandasamādhi ime ca padhānasaṅkhārā,
anya-e0102n:65_19: Ettha hi iddhimuppādetukāmatāchando samādhinā ekato niyuttova iddhilābhāya saṃvattati;
anya-e0102n:65_21: Tasmā imāni aṭṭha padāni vuttānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:66_1: Soḷasa mūlānīti soḷasahi ākārehi āneñjatā cittassa veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:66_5: anonataṃ cittaṃ kosajje na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_6: anunnataṃ cittaṃ uddhacce na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_7: anabhinataṃ cittaṃ rāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_8: anapanataṃ cittaṃ byāpāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_9: anissitaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭhiyā na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_10: appaṭibaddhaṃ cittaṃ chandarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_11: vippamuttaṃ cittaṃ kāmarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_12: visaṃyuttaṃ cittaṃ kilese na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_13: vimariyādikataṃ cittaṃ kilesamariyāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_14: ekattagataṃ cittaṃ nānattakilese na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_15: saddhāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ assaddhiye na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_16: vīriyena pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ kosajje na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_17: satiyā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ pamāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_18: samādhinā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ uddhacce na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_19: paññāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ avijjāya na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:66_20: obhāsagataṃ cittaṃ avijjandhakāre na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
anya-e0102n:67_0: Kāmañca esa attho evaṃ samāhite cittetiādināpi siddhoyeva,
anya-e0102n:67_1: paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ pana iddhiyā bhūmipādapadamūlabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna vutto.
anya-e0102n:68_1: Ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahantoti svāyamete iddhiyā bhūmipādapadabhūte dhamme sampādetvā abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
anya-e0102n:68_2: vuṭṭhāya sace sataṃ icchati “sataṃ homi sataṃ homī”ti parikammaṃ katvā puna abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
anya-e0102n:68_6: Sace evaṃ na ijjhati puna parikammaṃ katvā dutiyampi samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:68_7: Saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ hi ekavāraṃ dvevāraṃ samāpajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:68_12: Adhiṭṭhānacittampi tatheva satārammaṇaṃ vā sahassārammaṇaṃ vā.
anya-e0102n:68_13: Taṃ pubbe vuttaṃ appanācittamiva gotrabhuanantaraṃ ekameva uppajjati rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānikaṃ.
anya-e0102n:69_1: Yampi paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttaṃ “pakatiyā eko bahukaṃ āvajjati sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:69_9: samāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā puna bahuko homīti āvajjitvā tato paraṃ pavattānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ vā pubbabhāgacittānaṃ
anya-e0102n:69_10: anantarā uppannena sanniṭṭhāpanavasena adhiṭṭhānanti laddhanāmena ekeneva abhiññāñāṇena adhiṭṭhātīti
anya-e0102n:70_3: Te kira dvebhātaro panthe jātattā panthakāti nāmaṃ labhiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:70_5: so pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0102n:71_0: Padumaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandhaṃ, pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṃ;
anya-e0102n:73_1: So taṃ catūhi māsehi paguṇaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi.
anya-e0102n:73_2: Atha naṃ thero abhabbo tvaṃ sāsaneti vihārato nīhari.
anya-e0102n:73_5: bhagavatā saddhiṃ pañcabhikkhusatāni gahetvā amhākaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha.
anya-e0102n:73_6: Theropi ṭhapetvā cūḷapanthakaṃ sesānaṃ adhivāsemīti adhivāsesi.
anya-e0102n:74_1: Bhagavā dibbacakkhunā disvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā kasmā rodasīti āha.
anya-e0102n:74_3: Bhagavā na sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto mama sāsane abhabbo nāma hoti,
anya-e0102n:74_4: mā soci bhikkhūti taṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā iddhiyā pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ abhinimminitvā adāsi,
anya-e0102n:74_5: handa bhikkhu imaṃ parimajjanto rajoharaṇaṃ rajoharaṇanti punappunaṃ sajjhāyaṃ karohīti.
anya-e0102n:74_6: Tassa tathā karoto taṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0102n:74_9: attabhāvassa panāyaṃ dosoti saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā pañcasu khandhesu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anulomato gotrabhusamīpaṃ pāpesi.
anya-e0102n:75_0: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
anya-e0102n:80_0: “Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
anya-e0102n:84_0: Tassa gāthāpariyosāne catupaṭisambhidāchaḷabhiññāparivārā nava lokuttaradhammā hatthagatāva ahesuṃ.
anya-e0102n:85_0: Satthā dutiyadivase jīvakassa gehaṃ agamāsi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena.
anya-e0102n:85_1: Atha dakkhiṇodakāvasāne yāguyā diyyamānāya hatthena pattaṃ pidahi.
anya-e0102n:88_0: Atha so puriso gantvā kāsāvehi ekapajjotaṃ ārāmaṃ disvā āgantvā bhikkhūhi bharito bhante ārāmo,
anya-e0102n:88_1: nāhaṃ jānāmi katamo so ayyoti āha.
anya-e0102n:88_2: Tato naṃ bhagavā āha “gaccha yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passasi,
anya-e0102n:88_3: taṃ cīvarakaṇṇe gahetvā ‘satthā taṃ āmantetī’ti vatvā ānehī”ti.
anya-e0102n:88_4: So taṃ gantvā therasseva cīvarakaṇṇe aggahesi.
anya-e0102n:88_6: Thero “gaccha tva”nti taṃ uyyojetvā mukhadhovanādisarīrakiccaṃ niṭṭhapetvā paṭhamataraṃ gantvā pattāsane nisīdi.
anya-e0102n:89_0: Tatra ye te bahū nimmitā te aniyametvā nimmitattā iddhimatā sadisāva honti.
anya-e0102n:89_1: Ṭhānanisajjādīsu vā bhāsitatuṇhībhāvādīsu vā yaṃ yaṃ iddhimā karoti,
anya-e0102n:89_12: padabhāṇadhammakathāsarabhaññapañhapucchanapañhavissajjanarajanapacanacīvarasibbanadhovanādīni karonte aparepi vā nānappakārake kātukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n:89_13: tena pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya ettakā bhikkhū paṭhamavayā hontūtiādinā nayena parikammaṃ katvā puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:89_15: Esa nayo bahudhāpi hutvā eko hotītiādīsu.
anya-e0102n:90_1: iminā bhikkhunā evaṃ bahubhāvaṃ nimminitvā puna “ekova hutvā caṅkamissāmi,
anya-e0102n:90_5: sace keci āgamissanti ‘kuto ime ettakā ekasadisā bhikkhū,
anya-e0102n:90_6: addhā therassa esa ānubhāvo’ti maṃ jānissantī”ti appicchatāya vā antarāva “eko homī”ti icchantena pādakajjhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:90_7: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “eko homī”ti parikammaṃ katvā puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “eko homī”ti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:90_9: Evaṃ akaronto pana yathā paricchinnakālavasena sayameva eko hoti.
anya-e0102n:91_1: Āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvanti ettha āvibhāvaṃ karoti tirobhāvaṃ karotīti ayamattho.
anya-e0102n:91_2: Idameva hi sandhāya paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttaṃ “āvibhāvanti kenaci anāvaṭaṃ hoti appaṭicchannaṃ vivaṭaṃ pākaṭaṃ.
anya-e0102n:91_3: Tirobhāvanti kenaci āvaṭaṃ hoti paṭicchannaṃ pihitaṃ paṭikujjita”nti.
anya-e0102n:91_4: Tatrāyaṃ iddhimā āvibhāvaṃ kātukāmo andhakāraṃ vā ālokaṃ karoti,
anya-e0102n:91_7: Ayañhi yathā paṭicchannopi dūre ṭhitopi vā dissati,
anya-e0102n:91_8: evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā kātukāmo pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya idaṃ andhakāraṭṭhānaṃ ālokajātaṃ hotūti vā,
anya-e0102n:91_10: idaṃ anāpāthaṃ āpāthaṃ hotūti vā āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:92_3: Bhagavā hi cūḷasubhaddāya nimantito vissakammunā nimmitehi pañcahi kūṭāgārasatehi sāvatthito sattayojanabbhantaraṃ
anya-e0102n:92_7: Nagaramajjhe ca otaritvā pathaviṃ dvidhā bhinditvā yāva avīciṃ ākāsañca dvidhā viyūhitvā yāva brahmalokaṃ dassesi.
anya-e0102n:93_1: Bhagavā kira yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā caturāsītipāṇasahassāni bandhanā pamocetvā atītā buddhā yamakapāṭihāriyāvasāne
anya-e0102n:93_2: kuhiṃ gatāti āvajjitvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gatāti addasa.
anya-e0102n:93_3: Athekena pādena pathavītalaṃ akkamitvā dutiyaṃ yugandharapabbate patiṭṭhapetvā puna purimapādaṃ uddharitvā
anya-e0102n:93_4: sinerumatthakaṃ akkamitvā tattha paṇḍukambalasilātale vassaṃ upagantvā sannipatitānaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ
anya-e0102n:93_8: Bhagavā nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā uttarakurūsu piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā anotattadahatīre paribhuñjati.
anya-e0102n:93_10: Bhagavā ajja ettakaṃ dhammaṃ desesinti therassa nayaṃ deti.
anya-e0102n:93_11: Evaṃ tayo māse abbocchinnaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0102n:94_0: Yamakapāṭihāriye sannipatitāpi dvādasayojanā parisā bhagavantaṃ passitvāva gamissāmāti khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n:94_2: Manussā kuhiṃ bhagavāti jānanatthāya anuruddhattheraṃ yāciṃsu.
anya-e0102n:94_3: Thero ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā addasa dibbena cakkhunā tattha vassūpagataṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā ārocesi.
anya-e0102n:95_1: Thero parisamajjheyeva mahāpathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā sinerupabbataṃ nibbijjhitvā tathāgatapādamūle bhagavato
anya-e0102n:95_2: pāde vandamānova ummujjitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “jambudīpavāsino, bhante,
anya-e0102n:95_3: bhagavato pāde vanditvā passitvāva gamissāmāti vadantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:95_11: bhante”ti thero dasabalaṃ vanditvā āgatamaggeneva oruyha manussānaṃ santikaṃ sampāpuṇi.
anya-e0102n:95_12: Gamanāgamanakāle ca yathā naṃ manussā passanti,
anya-e0102n:96_0: So evaṃ āgato taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “dūranti saññaṃ akatvā katapātarāsāva nikkhamathā”ti āha.
anya-e0102n:96_9: Bhagavā dutiyadivase sinerumuddhani ṭhatvā puratthimalokadhātuṃ olokesi,
anya-e0102n:96_10: anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni vivaṭāni hutvā ekaṅgaṇaṃ viya pakāsiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:96_12: evaṃ pacchimenapi uttarenapi dakkhiṇenapi sabbaṃ vivaṭamaddasa.
anya-e0102n:97_0: Taṃ divasaṃ kira lokavivaraṇaṃ nāma ahosi.
anya-e0102n:97_8: suddhāvāsā ca mahābrahmā ca dakkhiṇapasse rajatamayena.
anya-e0102n:97_12: pañcasikho gandhabbaputto tigāvutamattaṃ beḷuvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ gahetvā tathāgatassa pūjaṃ karonto otarati.
anya-e0102n:97_13: Taṃdivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā buddhabhāvāya pihaṃ anuppādetvā ṭhitasatto nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:98_0: Apica tambapaṇṇidīpe talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnattheropi tissamahāvihāre cetiyaṅgaṇasmiṃ nisīditvā “tīhi,
anya-e0102n:98_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hotī”ti apaṇṇakasuttaṃ kathento heṭṭhāmukhaṃ bījaniṃ akāsi,
anya-e0102n:98_6: Thero nirayabhayena tajjetvā saggasukhena ca palobhetvā dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0102n:99_1: Tirobhāvaṃ kātukāmo pana ālokaṃ vā andhakāraṃ karoti,
anya-e0102n:99_4: Ayañhi yathā appaṭicchannopi samīpe ṭhitopi vā na dissati,
anya-e0102n:99_5: evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā kātukāmo pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “idaṃ ālokaṭṭhānaṃ andhakāraṃ hotū”ti vā,
anya-e0102n:99_7: “idaṃ āpāthaṃ anāpāthaṃ hotū”ti vā āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:100_3: Bhagavā hi yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ samīpe nisinnaṃyeva yathā naṃ pitā na passati,
anya-e0102n:100_5: Tathā vīsayojanasataṃ mahākappinassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā taṃ anāgāmiphale,
anya-e0102n:100_7: tassa anumaggaṃ āgatā sahassitthiparivārā anojādevī āgantvā samīpe nisinnāpi yathā saparisaṃ rājānaṃ na passati,
anya-e0102n:100_9: rājānaṃ passathā”ti vutte “kiṃ pana te rājānaṃ gavesituṃ varaṃ,
anya-e0102n:100_11: bhante”ti vatvā nisinnāya tassā tathā dhammaṃ desesi,
anya-e0102n:100_12: yathā sā saddhiṃ itthisahassena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi,
anya-e0102n:100_15: Apica tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ āgatadivase yathā attanā saddhiṃ āgate avasese rājā na passati,
anya-e0102n:101_1: Apica sabbampi pākaṭaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ āvibhāvaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:101_5: Tatra hi “idha tathāgato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karoti asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi.
anya-e0102n:101_7: heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā pavattatī”ti evaṃ ubhayaṃ paññāyittha.
anya-e0102n:101_10: Taṃ mahakasuttena ca brahmanimantanikasuttena ca dīpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:103_0: “Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ mahakaṃ etadavoca ‘sādhu me, bhante,
anya-e0102n:103_2: Tena hi tvaṃ gahapati āḷinde uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññāpetvā tiṇakalāpaṃ okāsehīti. ‘Evaṃ,
anya-e0102n:103_3: bhante’ti kho citto gahapati āyasmato mahakassa paṭissutvā āḷinde uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññāpetvā tiṇakalāpaṃ okāsesi.
anya-e0102n:103_4: Atha kho āyasmā mahako vihāraṃ pavisitvā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsi,
anya-e0102n:103_5: yathā tālacchiggaḷena ca aggaḷantarikāya ca acci nikkhamitvā tiṇāni jhāpesi,
anya-e0102n:105_2: tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsiṃ ‘ettāvatā brahmā ca brahmaparisā ca brahmapārisajjā ca saddañca me sossanti,
anya-e0102n:105_3: na ca maṃ dakkhissantī’ti antarahito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsiṃ –
anya-e0102n:107_0: Bhavaṃ nābhivadiṃ kiñci, nandiñca na upādiyi”’nti. ;
anya-e0102n:108_1: Tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati seyyathāpi ākāseti ettha tirokuṭṭanti parakuṭṭaṃ,
anya-e0102n:108_9: Evaṃ gantukāmena pana ākāsakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya kuṭṭaṃ vā pākāraṃ vā sinerucakkavāḷesupi aññataraṃ
anya-e0102n:108_10: pabbataṃ vā āvajjitvā kataparikammena ākāso hotūti adhiṭṭhātabbo.
anya-e0102n:109_3: kiṃ hatthiassādīni abhinimminitukāmo hatthiassādi kasiṇāni samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n:109_4: nanu yattha katthaci kasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā aṭṭhasamāpattivasībhāvoyeva pamāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:110_6: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kenaci anāvaṭe aparikkhitte asajjamānā gacchanti,
anya-e0102n:110_7: evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati,
anya-e0102n:111_0: Sace panassa bhikkhuno adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassa antarā pabbato vā rukkho vā uṭṭheti,
anya-e0102n:111_3: Puna samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhānaṃ hi upajjhāyassa santike nissayaggahaṇasadisaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:111_4: Iminā ca pana bhikkhunā ākāso hotūti adhiṭṭhitattā ākāso hotiyeva.
anya-e0102n:111_5: Purimādhiṭṭhānabaleneva cassa antarā añño pabbato vā rukkho vā utumayo uṭṭhahissatīti aṭṭhānamevetaṃ.
anya-e0102n:111_6: Aññena iddhimatā nimmite pana paṭhamanimmānaṃ balavaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:111_7: Itarena tassa uddhaṃ vā adho vā gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:112_1: Pathaviyāpi ummujjanimujjanti ettha ummujjanti uṭṭhānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0102n:112_4: Evaṃ kātukāmena āpokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya ettake ṭhāne pathavī udakaṃ hotūti paricchinditvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:112_5: Saha adhiṭṭhānena yathā paricchinne ṭhāne pathavī udakameva hoti.
anya-e0102n:113_6: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto udake ummujjanimujjaṃ karonti,
anya-e0102n:113_7: evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto pathaviyā ummujjanimujjaṃ karoti,
anya-e0102n:114_5: taṃ taṃ idañcidañca ettakaṃ hotūti āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhahantassa yathādhiṭṭhitameva hoti.
anya-e0102n:114_6: Uddharitvā bhājanagataṃ karontassa sappi sappimeva hoti.
anya-e0102n:114_11: Tasseva ca sā pathavī udakaṃ hoti sesajanassa pathavīyeva.
anya-e0102n:114_15: Sace panāyaṃ tesampi udakaṃ hotūti icchati, hotiyeva.
anya-e0102n:114_16: Paricchinnakālaṃ pana atikkamitvā yaṃ pakatiyā ghaṭataḷākādīsu udakaṃ,
anya-e0102n:114_17: taṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ paricchinnaṭṭhānaṃ pathavīyeva hoti.
anya-e0102n:115_1: Udakepi abhijjamāneti ettha yaṃ udakaṃ akkamitvā saṃsīdati,
anya-e0102n:115_4: Evaṃ gantukāmena pana pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ettake ṭhāne udakaṃ pathavī hotūti paricchinditvā
anya-e0102n:115_6: Saha adhiṭṭhānena yathā paricchinnaṭṭhāne udakaṃ pathavīyeva hoti.
anya-e0102n:116_6: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto abhijjamānāya pathaviyā gacchanti,
anya-e0102n:116_7: evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto abhijjamāne udake gacchati,
anya-e0102n:117_7: Tasseva ca taṃ udakaṃ pathavī hoti,
anya-e0102n:117_9: macchakacchapā ca udakakākādayo ca yathāruci vicaranti.
anya-e0102n:117_10: Sace panāyaṃ aññesampi manussānaṃ taṃ pathaviṃ kātuṃ icchati,
anya-e0102n:118_3: Evaṃ kātukāmena pana pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sace nisinno gantumicchati,
anya-e0102n:118_4: pallaṅkappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:118_6: sace padasā gantukāmo hoti maggappamāṇanti evaṃ yathānurūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā vuttanayeneva pathavī hotūti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:119_7: So ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti.
anya-e0102n:119_8: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto pathaviyaṃ caṅkamantipi…pe…
anya-e0102n:119_10: evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi…pe…
anya-e0102n:120_0: Ākāse gantukāmena ca bhikkhunā dibbacakkhulābhināpi bhavitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:120_5: Pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ākāso hotūti parikammaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:120_9: tena yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākāso hotūti adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:121_0: Apica okāse orohaṇatthampi iminā dibbacakkhulābhinā bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:121_1: ayañhi sace anokāse nhānatitthe vā gāmadvāre vā orohati.
anya-e0102n:121_3: Tasmā dibbacakkhunā passitvā anokāsaṃ vajjetvā okāse otaratīti.
anya-e0102n:122_1: Imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjatīti ettha candimasūriyānaṃ
anya-e0102n:122_3: tīsu dīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇena mahānubhāvatā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:122_4: Evaṃ upari caraṇaālokakaraṇehi vā mahiddhike teneva mahānubhāve.
anya-e0102n:123_1: parimajjatīti idha so iddhimā cetovasippatto candimasūriye āvajjati,
anya-e0102n:123_5: So nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye pāṇinā āmasati parāmasati parimajjati.
anya-e0102n:123_6: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kiñcideva rūpagataṃ hatthapāse āmasanti parāmasanti parimajjanti,
anya-e0102n:124_2: yadi pana idheva nisinnako vā nipannako vā parāmasitukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n:124_4: adhiṭṭhānabalena vaṇṭā muttatālaphalaṃ viya āgantvā hatthapāse ṭhite vā parāmasati,
anya-e0102n:127_0: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “sve, bhante,
anya-e0102n:127_1: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ amhākaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā pakkami.
anya-e0102n:127_2: Bhagavā adhivāsetvā taṃdivasāvasesaṃ rattibhāgañca vītināmetvā paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokesi.
anya-e0102n:127_3: Athassa nandopanando nāma nāgarājā ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchi.
anya-e0102n:127_5: atthi nu kho assa upanissayo”ti āvajjento “ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko tīsu ratanesu appasannoti disvā ko nu
anya-e0102n:127_6: kho imaṃ micchādiṭṭhito viveceyyā”ti āvajjento mahāmoggallānattheraṃ addasa.
anya-e0102n:128_0: Tato pabhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi – “ānanda,
anya-e0102n:128_1: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ ārocehi tathāgato devacārikaṃ gacchatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:128_3: So dibbaratanapallaṅke dibbena setacchattena dhāriyamānena tividhanāṭakehi ceva nāgaparisāya ca parivuto
anya-e0102n:128_4: dibbabhājanesu upaṭṭhāpitaṃ annapānavidhiṃ olokayamāno nisinno hoti.
anya-e0102n:128_6: tathā katvā tassa vitānamatthakeneva pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ tāvatiṃsadevalokābhimukho pāyāsi.
anya-e0102n:129_0: Tena kho pana samayena nandopanandassa nāgarājassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti –
anya-e0102n:129_1: “ime hi nāma muṇḍakā samaṇakā amhākaṃ uparūparibhavanena devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ bhavanaṃ pavisantipi nikkhamantipi,
anya-e0102n:129_2: na dāni ito paṭṭhāya imesaṃ amhākaṃ matthake pādapaṃsuṃ okirantānaṃ gantuṃ dassāmī”ti uṭṭhāya sinerupādaṃ
anya-e0102n:129_3: gantvā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
anya-e0102n:130_0: Atha kho āyasmā raṭṭhapālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “pubbe, bhante,
anya-e0102n:130_9: na vejayantassa pāsādassa upari dhajaṃ passāmī”ti. “Ayaṃ,
anya-e0102n:130_11: nandopanando nāma nāgarājā tumhākaṃ kupito sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇena paṭicchādetvā andhakāraṃ katvā ṭhito”ti.
anya-e0102n:130_15: Atha kho āyasmā bhaddiyo āyasmā rāhuloti anukkamena sabbepi bhikkhū uṭṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:131_3: Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā mahantaṃ nāgarājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā nandopanandaṃ cuddasakkhattuṃ bhogehi
anya-e0102n:131_4: parikkhipitvā tassa phaṇamatthake attano phaṇaṃ ṭhapetvā sinerunā saddhiṃ abhinippīḷesi.
anya-e0102n:131_6: Theropi na tuyhaṃyeva sarīre dhūmo atthi,
anya-e0102n:131_11: Theropi na tuyhaṃyeva sarīre aggi atthi,
anya-e0102n:131_15: Nāgarājā ayaṃ maṃ sinerunā abhinippīḷetvā dhūmāyati ceva pajjalati cāti cintetvā “bho tvaṃ kosī”ti paṭipucchi.
anya-e0102n:132_0: Thero taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā tassa dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā vāmakaṇṇasotena nikkhami,
anya-e0102n:132_5: Thero mukhena pavisitvā antokucchiyaṃ pācīnena ca pacchimena ca caṅkamati.
anya-e0102n:132_9: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā, tiṭṭhatu, bhante,
anya-e0102n:132_11: ahaṃ nandopanandasadisānaṃ nāgarājānaṃ satampi sahassampi satasahassampi dameyya”nti āha.
anya-e0102n:133_0: Nāgarājā cintesi “pavisanto tāva me na diṭṭho,
anya-e0102n:133_1: nikkhamanakāle dāni naṃ dāṭhantare pakkhipitvā saṅkhādissāmī”ti cintetvā nikkhama bhante,
anya-e0102n:133_2: mā maṃ antokucchiyaṃ aparāparaṃ caṅkamanto bādhayitthāti āha.
anya-e0102n:133_4: Nāgarājā ayaṃ soti disvā nāsavātaṃ vissajji.
anya-e0102n:133_7: Avasesā bhikkhū kira ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyāni kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyuṃ,
anya-e0102n:133_8: imaṃ pana ṭhānaṃ patvā evaṃ khippanisantino hutvā samāpajjituṃ na sakkhissantīti tesaṃ bhagavā nāgarājadamanaṃ nānujāni.
anya-e0102n:134_0: Nāgarājā “ahaṃ imassa samaṇassa nāsavātena lomakūpampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
anya-e0102n:134_2: Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā supaṇṇarūpaṃ abhinimminitvā supaṇṇavātaṃ dassento nāgarājānaṃ anubandhi.
anya-e0102n:134_3: Nāgarājā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā “bhante,
anya-e0102n:134_4: tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vadanto therassa pāde vandi.
anya-e0102n:134_6: ehi gamissāmā”ti nāgarājānaṃ damayitvā nibbisaṃ katvā gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0102n:134_10: nāgarājā”ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto anāthapiṇḍikassa nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0102n:135_2: Moggallānassa ca nandopanandassa ca saṅgāmo ahosīti. Kassa, bhante, jayo,
anya-e0102n:135_8: sattāhaṃ therassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā sattāhaṃ buddhapamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ akāsi.
anya-e0102n:135_9: Iti imaṃ imasmiṃ nandopanandadamane kataṃ mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “yadā mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ karoti,
anya-e0102n:135_11: Evaṃ vuttepi bhikkhū upādiṇṇakaṃ nissāya anupādiṇṇakameva vaḍḍhatīti āhaṃsu.
anya-e0102n:136_0: So evaṃ katvā na kevalaṃ candimasūriye parāmasati.
anya-e0102n:136_1: Sace icchati pādakathalikaṃ katvā pāde ṭhapeti,
anya-e0102n:136_7: Anekesupi hi bhikkhusatasahassesu evaṃ karontesu tesañca ekamekassa tatheva ijjhati.
anya-e0102n:136_9: Yathā hi pātisahassesu udakapūresu sabbapātīsu ca candamaṇḍalāni dissanti.
anya-e0102n:136_10: Pākatikameva ca candassa gamanaṃ ālokakaraṇañca hoti.
anya-e0102n:137_2: Kāyena vasaṃ vattetīti tattha brahmaloke kāyena attano vasaṃ vatteti.
anya-e0102n:138_1: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto brahmalokaṃ gantukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n:138_10: Dibbena cakkhunā tassa brahmuno rūpaṃ passati.
anya-e0102n:138_11: Dibbāya sotadhātuyā tassa brahmuno saddaṃ suṇāti.
anya-e0102n:138_13: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gantukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n:138_16: kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmetvā kāyavasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:138_17: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gantukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n:138_20: Cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmetvā cittavasena kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:138_21: So tassa brahmuno purato rūpaṃ abhinimmināti manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapañcaṅgiṃ ahīnindriyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:138_33: Sace so iddhimā tena brahmunā saddhiṃ santiṭṭhati,
anya-e0102n:138_36: nimmitopi tattha tena brahmunā saddhiṃ santiṭṭhati,
anya-e0102n:138_39: Yaṃ yadeva hi so iddhimā karoti,
anya-e0102n:139_0: Tattha dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhātīti pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya dūre devalokaṃ vā brahmalokaṃ vā āvajjati santike hotūti.
anya-e0102n:139_1: Āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā puna samāpajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti santike hotūti,
anya-e0102n:140_0: Tattha ko dūraṃ gahetvā santikaṃ akāsīti? Bhagavā.
anya-e0102n:140_1: Bhagavā hi yamakapāṭihāriyāvasāne devalokaṃ gacchanto yugandharañca sineruñca santike katvā pathavītalato
anya-e0102n:140_2: ekapādaṃ yugandhare patiṭṭhapetvā dutiyaṃ sinerumatthake ṭhapesi.
anya-e0102n:140_5: Thero hi sāvatthito bhattakiccaṃ katvā nikkhantaṃ dvādasayojanikaṃ parisaṃ tiṃsayojanaṃ saṅkassanagaramaggaṃ saṅkhipitvā taṅkhaṇaññeva sampāpesi.
anya-e0102n:141_1: Dubbhikkhasamaye kira therassa santikaṃ pātova satta bhikkhusatāni āgamaṃsu.
anya-e0102n:141_2: Thero “mahā bhikkhusaṅgho kuhiṃ bhikkhācāro bhavissatī”ti cintento sakalatambapaṇṇidīpe adisvā “paratīre
anya-e0102n:141_3: pāṭaliputte bhavissatī”ti disvā bhikkhū pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā “ethāvuso,
anya-e0102n:141_4: bhikkhācāraṃ gamissāmā”ti pathaviṃ saṅkhipitvā pāṭaliputtaṃ gato.
anya-e0102n:141_9: mahallakattherā nāma dūrepi gahetvā santike karontīti.
anya-e0102n:141_11: antarā ekaṃ nīlamātikaṃ atikkamitvā āgatatthāti? Āma, bhante.
anya-e0102n:142_1: evaṃ tissadattattheropi sāyanhasamaye nhāyitvā katuttarāsaṅgo mahābodhiṃ vandissāmīti citte uppanne santike akāsi.
anya-e0102n:143_0: Santikaṃ pana gahetvā ko dūramakāsīti? Bhagavā.
anya-e0102n:143_1: Bhagavā hi attano ca aṅgulimālassa ca antaraṃ santikampi dūramakāsīti.
anya-e0102n:144_2: Rājagahe kira nakkhattadivase pañcasatā kumāriyo candapūve gahetvā nakkhattakīḷanatthāya gacchantiyo bhagavantaṃ disvā kiñci nādaṃsu.
anya-e0102n:144_3: Pacchato āgacchantaṃ pana theraṃ disvā amhākaṃ thero eti pūvaṃ dassāmāti sabbā pūve gahetvā theraṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:145_2: Mahākassapatthero kira sattāhaṃ samāpattiyā vītināmetvā daliddasaṅgahaṃ karonto kākavaliyassa nāma duggatamanussassa gharadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n:145_3: Tassa jāyā theraṃ disvā patino pakkaṃ aloṇambilayāguṃ patte ākiri.
anya-e0102n:145_4: Thero taṃ gahetvā bhagavato hatthe ṭhapesi.
anya-e0102n:146_4: Tathā hi mahāanuḷatthero nāma sambahule bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā sukkhabhattameva labhitvā gaṅgātīre nisīditvā
anya-e0102n:146_5: paribhuñjamāne disvā gaṅgāya udakaṃ sappimaṇḍanti adhiṭṭhahitvā sāmaṇerānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0102n:147_0: Dibbena cakkhunāti idheva ṭhito ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tassa brahmuno rūpaṃ passati.
anya-e0102n:147_1: Idheva ca ṭhito sabbaṃ tassa bhāsato saddaṃ suṇāti.
anya-e0102n:147_3: Kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmetīti karajakāyassa vasena cittaṃ pariṇāmeti.
anya-e0102n:147_7: Sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamatīti pādakajjhānārammaṇena iddhicittena sahajātaṃ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamati pavisati phasseti sampāpuṇāti.
anya-e0102n:147_10: Sāyeva ca saññā nīvaraṇehi ceva vitakkādīhi paccanīkehi ca vimuttattā lahusaññātipi veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:147_11: Taṃ okkantassa panassa karajakāyopi tūlapicu viya sallahuko hoti.
anya-e0102n:147_12: So evaṃ vāyukkhittatūlapicunā viya sallahukena dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:147_13: Evaṃ gacchanto ca sace icchati pathavīkasiṇavasena ākāse maggaṃ nimminitvā padasā gacchati.
anya-e0102n:147_14: Sace icchati vāyokasiṇavasena vāyuṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā tūlapicu viya vāyunā gacchati.
anya-e0102n:147_16: “Sati hi gantukāmatāya” evaṃ katacittādhiṭṭhāno adhiṭṭhānavegukkhittova so issāsakhittasaro viya dissamāno gacchati.
anya-e0102n:148_0: Cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmetīti kāyaṃ gahetvā citte āropeti.
anya-e0102n:148_3: Sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamatīti rūpakāyārammaṇena iddhicittena sahajātaṃ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamatīti.
anya-e0102n:148_6: Evaṃ adissamānena kāyena gacchanto panāyaṃ kiṃ tassa adhiṭṭhānacittassa uppādakkhaṇe gacchati,
anya-e0102n:148_7: udāhu ṭhitikkhaṇe bhaṅgakkhaṇe vāti vutte tīsupi khaṇesu gacchatīti thero āha.
anya-e0102n:148_8: Kiṃ pana so sayaṃ gacchati nimmitaṃ pesetīti.
anya-e0102n:149_3: Sace iddhimā caṅkamati nimmitopi tattha caṅkamatītiādi sabbaṃ sāvakanimmitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:149_4: Buddhanimmito pana yaṃ yaṃ bhagavā karoti,
anya-e0102n:149_7: Ettha ca yaṃ so iddhimā idheva ṭhito dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:149_11: Yampi so idheva ṭhito tena brahmunā saddhiṃ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n:149_15: Yampi so dissamānena vā adissamānena vā kāyena brahmalokaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0102n:149_17: Yañca kho so tassa brahmuno purato rūpaṃ abhinimminātītiādinā nayena vuttavidhānaṃ āpajjati,
anya-e0102n:149_19: Sesaṃ panettha kāyena vasaṃ vattanāya pubbabhāgadassanatthaṃ vuttanti ayaṃ tāva adhiṭṭhānā iddhi.
anya-e0102n:150_1: Vikubbanāya pana manomayāya ca idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:150_2: Vikubbanaṃ tāva karontena “so pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti,
anya-e0102n:150_18: vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evaṃ vuttesu kumārakavaṇṇādīsu yaṃ yaṃ ākaṅkhati,
anya-e0102n:150_20: Adhiṭṭhahantena ca pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññatarārammaṇato abhiññāpādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya attano kumārakavaṇṇo āvajjitabbo.
anya-e0102n:150_21: Āvajjitvā parikammāvasāne puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya evarūpo nāma kumārako homīti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:150_22: Saha adhiṭṭhānacittena kumārako hoti devadatto viya.
anya-e0102n:151_0: Hatthimpi dassetītiādi panettha bahiddhāpi hatthiādidassanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:151_1: Tattha hatthī homīti anadhiṭṭhahitvā hatthī hotūti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:152_1: Manomayaṃ kātukāmo pana pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kāyaṃ tāva āvajjitvā vuttanayeneva susiro hotūti adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:152_3: Athassa abbhantare aññaṃ kāyaṃ āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:152_5: So taṃ muñjamhā īsikaṃ viya kosiyā asiṃ viya karaṇḍāya ahiṃ viya ca abbāhati.
anya-e0102n:152_6: Tena vuttaṃ “idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ ahīnindriyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:152_8: tassa evamassa ayaṃ muñjo ayaṃ īsikā,
anya-e0102n:152_11: Ettha ca yathā īsikādayo muñjādīhi sadisā honti,
anya-e0102n:152_12: evaṃ manomayarūpaṃ iddhimatāsadisameva hotīti dassanatthaṃ etā upamā vuttāti.
anya-e0102n:158_2: Tattha tato parāsu ca tīsu abhiññāsu so evaṃ samāhite cittetiādīnaṃ attho vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:158_4: Tatra dibbāya sotadhātuyāti ettha dibbasadisattā dibbā.
anya-e0102n:158_5: Devānaṃ hi sucaritakammanibbattā pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhā upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:158_7: Ayañcāpi imassa bhikkhuno vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattā ñāṇasotadhātu tādisāyevāti dibbasadisattā dibbā.
anya-e0102n:158_8: Apica dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbā.
anya-e0102n:159_1: Atikkantamānusikāyāti manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā saddasavanena mānusikaṃ maṃsasotadhātuṃ atikkantāya vītivattitvā ṭhitāya.
anya-e0102n:159_2: Ubho sadde suṇātīti dve sadde suṇāti.
anya-e0102n:159_7: Ye dūre santike cāti ye saddā dūre paracakkavāḷepi ye ca santike antamaso sadehasannissitapāṇakasaddāpi,
anya-e0102n:160_1: Tena bhikkhunā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya parikammasamādhicittena paṭhamataraṃ pakatisotapathe
anya-e0102n:160_2: dūre oḷāriko araññe sīhādīnaṃ saddo āvajjitabbo.
anya-e0102n:160_14: kunthakipillikādisaddoti evaṃ sabboḷārikato pabhuti yathākkamena sukhumasaddā āvajjitabbā.
anya-e0102n:160_15: Tena puratthimāya disāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasikātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:160_24: Tassa te saddā pākatikacittassāpi pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0102n:161_0: Tassevaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasikaroto idāni dibbasotadhātu uppajjissatīti tesu saddesu aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:161_1: Tasmiṃ niruddhe cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti,
anya-e0102n:161_2: yesaṃ purimāni tīṇi cattāri vā parikammaupacārānulomagotrabhunāmakāni kāmāvacarāni,
anya-e0102n:161_3: catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā appanācittaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ catutthajjhānikaṃ.
anya-e0102n:161_4: Tattha yaṃ tena appanācittena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:161_6: Tato paraṃ tasmiṃ sote patito hoti.
anya-e0102n:161_7: Taṃ thāmajātaṃ karontena “etthantare saddaṃ suṇāmī”ti ekaṅgulamattaṃ paricchinditvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:161_9: yāva cakkavāḷaṃ tato vā bhiyyopi paricchinditvā paricchinditvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:162_0: Evaṃ adhigatābhiñño esa pādakajjhānārammaṇena phuṭṭhokāsabbhantaragatepi sadde puna pādakajjhānaṃ asamāpajjitvāpi abhiññāñāṇena suṇātiyeva.
anya-e0102n:162_1: Evaṃ suṇanto ca sacepi yāva brahmalokā saṅkhabheripaṇavādisaddehi ekakolāhalaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:162_2: pāṭiyekkaṃ vavatthapetukāmatāya sati ayaṃ saṅkhasaddo ayaṃ bherisaddoti vavatthapetuṃ sakkotiyevāti.
anya-e0102n:165_8: Veneyyavasena pana desanāvilāsena ca byañjananānattaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0102n:165_9: Cetasā cetoti attano cittena tesaṃ cittaṃ.
anya-e0102n:165_10: Paricca pajānātīti paricchinditvā sarāgādivasena nānappakārato jānāti.
anya-e0102n:166_3: Tasmā tena bhikkhunā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā parassa hadayarūpaṃ nissāya vattamānassa lohitassa vaṇṇaṃ passitvā cittaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:166_12: idaṃ upekkhindriyasamuṭṭhāna”nti parassa hadayalohitavaṇṇaṃ passitvā cittaṃ pariyesantena cetopariyañāṇaṃ thāmagataṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:166_13: Evaṃ thāmagate hi tasmiṃ anukkamena sabbampi kāmāvacaracittaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacaracittañca pajānāti cittā
anya-e0102n:166_15: Vuttampi cetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “āruppe parassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo kassa hadayarūpaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:166_18: Iddhimato visayo esa yadidaṃ yattha katthaci cittaṃ āvajjanto soḷasappabhedaṃ cittaṃ jānāti.
anya-e0102n:167_0: Sarāgaṃ vā cittantiādīsu pana aṭṭhavidhaṃ lobhasahagataṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:167_2: Dve domanassacittāni dve vicikicchuddhaccacittānīti imāni pana cattāri cittāni imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti.
anya-e0102n:167_4: Duvidhaṃ pana domanassacittaṃ sadosaṃ cittaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:167_6: Sesāni dasākusalacittāni imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti.
anya-e0102n:168_0: Samohaṃ vītamohanti ettha pana pāṭipuggalikanayena vicikicchuddhaccasahagatadvayameva samohaṃ,
anya-e0102n:168_1: mohassa pana sabbākusalesu sambhavato dvādasavidhampi akusalacittaṃ samohaṃ cittanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:168_13: Iti cetopariyañāṇalābhī bhikkhu sabbappakārampi idaṃ sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:168_14: avimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ avimuttaṃ cittanti pajānātīti.
anya-e0102n:171_4: Nivutthāti ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā.
anya-e0102n:171_6: Nivutthāti gocaranivāsena nivutthā attano viññāṇena viññātā paricchinnā,
anya-e0102n:171_12: Evamimassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa atthāya pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya etassa ñāṇassa adhigamāya pattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:172_3: Pubbenivāsanti samanantarātītabhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthasantānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:172_4: Anussaratīti khandhapaṭipāṭivasena cutipaṭisandhivasena vā anugantvā anugantvā sarati.
anya-e0102n:172_5: Imañhi pubbenivāsaṃ cha janā anussaranti – titthiyā,
anya-e0102n:174_1: paṭipāṭiṃ muñcitvā cutipaṭisandhivasena sarituṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0102n:174_3: Yathā pana andhā yaṭṭhiṃ amuñcitvāva gacchanti,
anya-e0102n:174_4: evaṃ te khandhānaṃ paṭipāṭiṃ amuñcitvāva saranti.
anya-e0102n:174_8: Ekassa attabhāvassa cutiṃ disvā paṭisandhiṃ passanti,
anya-e0102n:174_9: puna aparassa cutiṃ disvā paṭisandhinti evaṃ cutipaṭisandhivaseneva saṅkamantā gacchanti.
anya-e0102n:175_2: Tesañhi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu heṭṭhā vā upari vā yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ icchanti,
anya-e0102n:175_4: Tasmā anekāpi kappakoṭiyo peyyālapāḷiṃ viya saṃkhipitvā yaṃ yaṃ icchanti,
anya-e0102n:175_6: Evaṃ gacchantānañca nesaṃ ñāṇaṃ yathā nāma katavālavedhaparicayassa sarabhaṅgasadisassa dhanuggahassa
anya-e0102n:175_7: khitto saro antarā rukkhalatādīsu asajjamāno lakkheyeva patati,
anya-e0102n:176_0: Imesu ca pana pubbenivāsaṃ anussaraṇasattesu titthiyānaṃ pubbenivāsadassanaṃ khajjupanakapabhāsadisaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:177_0: Titthiyānañca pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ andhānaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭigamanaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0102n:178_0: Imasmiṃ pana adhikāre sāvakānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0102n:178_1: Tena vuttaṃ “anussaratīti khandhapaṭipāṭivasena cutipaṭisandhivasena vā anugantvā anugantvā saratī”ti.
anya-e0102n:179_1: Tasmā evamanussaritukāmena ādikammikena bhikkhunā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena rahogatena paṭisallinena
anya-e0102n:179_2: paṭipāṭiyā cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā abhiññāpādakacatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya sabbapacchimā nisajjā
anya-e0102n:179_18: paṭhamayāme katakiccanti evaṃ paṭilomakkamena sakalaṃ rattindivaṃ katakiccaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:180_0: Sace panettha kiñci na pākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:180_2: Ettakena dīpe jalite viya pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:180_3: Evaṃ paṭilomakkameneva dutiyadivasepi tatiyacatutthapañcamadivasepi dasāhepi aḍḍhamāsepi māsepi yāva saṃvaccharāpi katakiccaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:180_4: Eteneva upāyena dasavassāni vīsativassānīti yāva imasmiṃ bhave attano paṭisandhi,
anya-e0102n:180_5: tāva āvajjantena purimabhave cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:180_6: Pahoti hi paṇḍito bhikkhu paṭhamavāreneva paṭisandhiṃ ugghāṭetvā cutikkhaṇe nāmarūpamārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ.
anya-e0102n:181_0: Yasmā pana purimabhave nāmarūpaṃ asesaṃ niruddhaṃ aññaṃ uppannaṃ,
anya-e0102n:181_1: tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ āhundarikaṃ andhatamamiva hoti duddasaṃ duppaññena.
anya-e0102n:181_2: Tenāpi “na sakkomahaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ugghāṭetvā cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpamārammaṇaṃ kātu”nti dhuranikkhepo na kātabbo.
anya-e0102n:181_4: Tato ca vuṭṭhāya vuṭṭhāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:182_0: Evaṃ karonto hi seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso kūṭāgārakaṇṇikatthāya mahārukkhaṃ chindanto sākhāpalāsacchedanamatteneva
anya-e0102n:182_1: pharasudhārāya vipannāya mahārukkhaṃ chindituṃ asakkontopi dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvāva kammārasālaṃ gantvā
anya-e0102n:182_2: tikhiṇaṃ pharasuṃ kārāpetvā puna āgantvā chindeyya,
anya-e0102n:182_3: puna vipannāya ca punapi tatheva kāretvā chindeyya.
anya-e0102n:182_4: So evaṃ chindanto chinnassa chinnassa puna chetabbābhāvato acchinnassa ca chedanato nacirasseva mahārukkhaṃ pāteyya,
anya-e0102n:182_5: evamevaṃ pādakajjhānā vuṭṭhāya pubbe āvajjitaṃ anāvajjitvā paṭisandhimeva āvajjanto nacirasseva paṭisandhiṃ
anya-e0102n:183_0: Tattha pacchimanisajjato pabhuti yāva paṭisandhito ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ nāma na hoti.
anya-e0102n:183_4: Yadā panassa bhikkhuno paṭisandhiṃ atikkamma cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:183_5: tasmiñca niruddhe tadevārammaṇaṃ katvā cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti.
anya-e0102n:183_6: Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva purimāni parikammādināmakāni kāmāvacarāni honti.
anya-e0102n:183_8: Tadāssa yaṃ tena cittena saha ñāṇaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:183_10: Tena ñāṇena sampayuttāya satiyā anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
anya-e0102n:183_13: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussaratīti.
anya-e0102n:184_1: Tattha ekampi jātinti ekampi paṭisandhimūlaṃ cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhasantānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:184_3: Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappetiādīsu pana parihāyamāno kappo saṃvaṭṭakappo,
anya-e0102n:186_6: Vitthārato pana sadāpi ekaṃ buddhakhettaṃ vinassati.
anya-e0102n:187_7: yattha ratanasuttaṃ khandhaparittaṃ dhajaggaparittaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ moraparittanti imesaṃ parittānaṃ ānubhāvo vattati.
anya-e0102n:187_12: Evametesu tīsu buddhakhettesu ekaṃ āṇākhettaṃ vinassati.
anya-e0102n:187_13: Tasmiṃ pana vinassante jātikhettampi vinaṭṭhameva hoti.
anya-e0102n:188_1: Yasmiṃ hi samaye kappo agginā nassati,
anya-e0102n:188_2: āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe ekaṃ mahāvassaṃ vassati.
anya-e0102n:188_4: Sassesu pana gokhāyitakamattesu jātesu gadrabharavaṃ ravanto ekabindumpi na vassati,
anya-e0102n:188_6: Idaṃ sandhāya hi bhagavatā “hoti kho so,
anya-e0102n:188_8: samayo yaṃ bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni devo na vassatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:188_11: Evaṃ dīghe addhāne vītivatte tattha tattha udakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0102n:189_1: etesañca keci dubbhikkhapīḷitā keci abhabbā jhānādhigamāya,
anya-e0102n:189_4: Tadā hi “vassasatasahassassaccayena kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti lokabyūhā nāma kāmāvacaradevā muttasirā
anya-e0102n:189_5: vikiṇṇakesā rudamukhā assūni hatthehi puñchamānā rattavatthanivatthā ativiya virūpavesadhārino hutvā
anya-e0102n:189_6: manussapathe vicarantā evaṃ ārocenti “mārisā ito vassasatasahassassaccayena kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati,
anya-e0102n:189_9: ayañca mahāpathavī sineru ca pabbatarājā uddayhissanti vinassissanti.
anya-e0102n:190_0: Tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññāni karitvā devaloke nibbattanti.
anya-e0102n:190_1: Tattha dibbasudhābhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ paṭilabhanti.
anya-e0102n:190_2: Tadaññe pana aparāpariyavedanīyena kammena devaloke nibbattanti.
anya-e0102n:190_3: Aparāpariyavedanīyakammarahito hi saṃsāre saṃsaramāno satto nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:190_5: Evaṃ devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena sabbepi brahmaloke nibbattantīti.
anya-e0102n:191_0: Vassūpacchedato pana uddhaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati.
anya-e0102n:191_4: Pātubhūte ca pana tasmiṃ neva rattiparicchedo,
anya-e0102n:191_11: Tattha pakatisūriye vattamāne ākāse valāhakāpi dhūmasikhāpi caranti.
anya-e0102n:191_12: Kappavināsakasūriye vattamāne vigatadhūmavalāhakaṃ ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya nimmalaṃ nabhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:191_13: Ṭhapetvā pañca mahānadiyo sesakunnadīādīsu udakaṃ sussati.
anya-e0102n:192_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati. Yassa pātubhāvā mahānadiyopi sussanti.
anya-e0102n:193_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati.
anya-e0102n:193_1: Yassa pātubhāvā himavati mahānadīnaṃ pabhavā “sīhapapāto haṃsapātano kaṇṇamuṇḍako rathakāradaho anotattadaho
anya-e0102n:193_2: chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho”ti ime satta mahāsarā sussanti.
anya-e0102n:194_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati.
anya-e0102n:194_1: Yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahāsamudde aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:195_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho sūriyo pātubhavati.
anya-e0102n:196_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo sūriyo pātubhavati.
anya-e0102n:196_1: Yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ekajālaṃ hoti saddhiṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷehi.
anya-e0102n:196_6: Tattha tayopi brahmaloke jhāpetvā ābhassare āhacca tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0102n:196_9: Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā pana sappitelajhāpanaggisikhā viya chārikampi anavasesetvā nibbāyati.
anya-e0102n:196_10: Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāro.
anya-e0102n:197_1: Atha dīghassa addhuno accayena mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā paṭhamaṃ sukhumaṃ sukhumaṃ vassati.
anya-e0102n:197_2: Anupubbena kumudanāḷayaṭṭhimusalatālakkhandhādippamāṇāhi dhārāhi vassanto koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu sabbaṃ daḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā antaradhāyati.
anya-e0102n:197_3: Taṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vāto samuṭṭhahitvā ghanaṃ karoti parivaṭumaṃ paduminipatte udakabindusadisaṃ.
anya-e0102n:197_4: Kathaṃ tāva mahantaṃ udakarāsiṃ ghanaṃ karotīti ce?
anya-e0102n:197_7: Taṃ evaṃ vātena sampiṇḍiyamānaṃ ghanaṃ kariyamānaṃ parikkhayamānaṃ anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati.
anya-e0102n:198_1: Te taṃ pihitadvāre dhamakaraṇe ṭhitaudakamiva nirassāsaṃ katvā rundhanti.
anya-e0102n:198_2: Madhurodakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchamānaṃ upari rasapathaviṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:198_3: Sā vaṇṇasampannā ceva hoti gandharasasampannā ca nirudakapāyāsassa upari paṭalaṃ viya.
anya-e0102n:199_0: Tadā ca ābhassarabrahmaloke paṭhamatarābhinibbattā sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vā tato cavitvā idhūpapajjanti.
anya-e0102n:199_2: Te aggaññasutte vuttanayena taṃ rasapathaviṃ sāyitvā taṇhābhibhūtā āluppakārakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ upakkamanti.
anya-e0102n:200_0: Tato nesaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayantaṃ paripuṇṇapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ pātubhavati,
anya-e0102n:200_1: te taṃ disvā “ālokaṃ paṭilabhimhā”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ bhītānaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayanto uṭṭhito,
anya-e0102n:201_0: Atha sūriye divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgate yampi ālokaṃ labhimhā,
anya-e0102n:201_1: sopi no naṭṭhoti puna bhītā honti.
anya-e0102n:201_2: Tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “sādhu vatassa sace aññaṃ ālokaṃ labheyyāmā”ti.
anya-e0102n:201_3: Tesaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā viya ekūnapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ pātubhavati.
anya-e0102n:201_4: Te taṃ disvā bhiyyoso mattāya haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā viya uṭṭhito,
anya-e0102n:201_5: tasmā cando hotū”ti candotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti.
anya-e0102n:201_6: Evaṃ candimasūriyesu pātubhūtesu nakkhattāni tārakarūpāni pātubhavanti.
anya-e0102n:202_3: Te ca kho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva pātubhavanti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:202_4: Yathā nāma kaṅgubhatte paccamāne ekappahāreneva pupphuḷakāni uṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0102n:203_0: Atha tesaṃ sattānaṃ rasapathaviṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ kamena ekacce vaṇṇavanto,
anya-e0102n:203_5: Atha nesaṃ teneva nayena sopi antaradhāyati.
anya-e0102n:203_8: Akaṭṭhapāko sāli pātubhavati akaṇo athuso suddho sugandho taṇḍulapphalo.
anya-e0102n:204_1: Te sāliṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyā ṭhapenti,
anya-e0102n:204_4: na tassa sūpena vā byañjanena vā karaṇīyaṃ atthi.
anya-e0102n:204_7: Tesaṃ taṃ oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharayataṃ tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ sañjāyati.
anya-e0102n:204_8: Atha nesaṃ tassa nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni pabhijjanti,
anya-e0102n:205_4: Te asaddhammapaṭisevanapaccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā tassa asaddhammassa paṭicchādanahetu agārāni karonti.
anya-e0102n:205_5: Te agāraṃ ajjhāvasamānā anukkamena aññatarassa alasajātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantā sannidhiṃ karonti.
anya-e0102n:205_6: Tato pabhuti kaṇopi thusopi taṇḍulaṃ pariyonandhati,
anya-e0102n:206_0: Te sannipatitvā anutthunanti “pāpakā vata bho dhammā sattesu pātubhūtā,
anya-e0102n:206_1: mayaṃ hi pubbe manomayā ahumhā”ti aggaññasutte vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:206_3: Atha aññataro satto aññassa bhāgaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyati.
anya-e0102n:206_4: Taṃ dvikkhattuṃ paribhāsetvā tatiyavāre pāṇileṭṭudaṇḍehi paharanti.
anya-e0102n:206_5: Te evaṃ adinnādānagarahamusāvādadaṇḍādānesu uppannesu sannipatitvā cintayanti “yaṃnūna mayaṃ ekaṃ sattaṃ sammanneyyāma,
anya-e0102n:207_0: Evaṃ katasanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmiṃ tāva kappe ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tena samayena
anya-e0102n:207_1: tesu sattesu abhirūpataro ca dassanīyataro ca mahesakkhataro ca buddhisampanno paṭibalo niggahapaggahaṃ kātuṃ.
anya-e0102n:207_5: dhammena samena pare rañjetīti rājāti tīhi nāmehi paññāyittha.
anya-e0102n:207_7: bodhisattova tattha ādipurisoti evaṃ bodhisattaṃ ādiṃ katvā khattiyamaṇḍale saṇṭhite anupubbena brāhmaṇādayopi vaṇṇā saṇṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:208_0: Tattha kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva jālupacchedo, idamekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ saṃvaṭṭoti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:210_0: Sampattimahāmeghato yāva candimasūriyapātubhāvo, idaṃ tatiyaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ vivaṭṭoti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:211_2: Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni eko mahākappo hoti.
anya-e0102n:211_3: Evaṃ tāva agginā vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:212_1: Yasmiṃ pana samaye kappo udakena nassati,
anya-e0102n:212_2: āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvāti pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:212_6: So ādito sukhumaṃ sukhumaṃ vassanto anukkamena mahādhārāhi koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷānaṃ pūrento vassati.
anya-e0102n:212_10: Tattha tayopi brahmaloke vilīyāpetvā subhakiṇhe āhacca tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0102n:212_13: Udakānugataṃ pana sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ abhibhavitvā sahasā vūpasammati antaradhānaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:212_14: Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ.
anya-e0102n:212_15: Kevalaṃ panidha ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati.
anya-e0102n:212_16: Subhakiṇhato ca cavitvā ābhassaraṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti.
anya-e0102n:213_5: imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni eko mahākappo hoti.
anya-e0102n:213_6: Evaṃ udakena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:214_2: āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvāti pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:214_7: Tato saṇharajaṃ sukhumavālikaṃ thūlavālikaṃ sakkharapāsāṇādayoti yāva kūṭāgāramatte pāsāṇe visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkhe ca uṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:214_8: Te pathavito nabhamuggatā na ca puna patanti.
anya-e0102n:215_0: Athānukkamena heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā vāto samuṭṭhahitvā pathaviṃ parivattetvā uddhaṃmūlaṃ katvā ākāse khipati.
anya-e0102n:215_2: khittā ākāseyeva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0102n:215_3: Cakkavāḷapabbatampi sinerupabbatampi vāto ukkhipitvā ākāse khipati.
anya-e0102n:215_4: Te aññamaññaṃ abhihantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti.
anya-e0102n:215_5: Eteneva upāyena bhummaṭṭhakavimānāni ca ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni ca vināsento chakāmāvacaradevaloke vināsetvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷāni vināseti.
anya-e0102n:215_6: Tattha cakkavāḷā cakkavāḷehi himavantā himavantehi sinerū sinerūhi aññamaññaṃ samāgantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti.
anya-e0102n:215_8: Tattha tayopi brahmaloke vināsetvā vehapphalaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0102n:215_10: Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ.
anya-e0102n:215_11: Idha pana subhakiṇhabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati.
anya-e0102n:215_12: Vehapphalato ca cavitvā subhakiṇhaṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti.
anya-e0102n:216_4: imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni eko mahākappo hoti.
anya-e0102n:216_5: Evaṃ vātena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:217_3: Akusalamūlesu hi ussannesu evaṃ loko vinassati.
anya-e0102n:217_4: So ca kho rāge ussannatare agginā vinassati.
anya-e0102n:217_9: Evaṃ vinassantopi ca nirantarameva sattavāre agginā vinassati.
anya-e0102n:217_12: Aṭṭhame vāre udakenāti evaṃ aṭṭhame aṭṭhame vāre vinassanto sattakkhattuṃ udakena vinassitvā puna sattavāre agginā nassati.
anya-e0102n:217_14: Etthantare udakena nassanavāraṃ sampattampi paṭibāhitvā laddhokāso vāto paripuṇṇacatusaṭṭhikappāyuke subhakiṇhe viddhaṃsento lokaṃ vināseti.
anya-e0102n:218_1: Pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantopi ca kappānussaraṇako bhikkhu etesu kappesu anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe
anya-e0102n:219_0: Tattha amutrāsinti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe ahaṃ amumhi bhave vā yoniyā vā gatiyā vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye vā āsiṃ.
anya-e0102n:219_4: Sace pana tasmiṃ kāle attano vaṇṇasampattiṃ vā lūkhapaṇītajīvikabhāvaṃ vā sukhadukkhabahulataṃ vā appāyukadīghāyukabhāvaṃ vā anussaritukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n:220_0: Tattha evaṃvaṇṇoti odāto vā sāmo vā.
anya-e0102n:220_2: Evaṃ sukhadukkhapaṭisaṃvedīti anekappakārena kāyikacetasikānaṃ sāmisanirāmisādippabhedānaṃ vā sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
anya-e0102n:220_3: Evamāyupariyantoti evaṃ vassasataparimāṇāyupariyanto vā caturāsītikappasatasahassāyupariyanto vā.
anya-e0102n:220_4: So tato cuto amutra udapādinti sohaṃ tato bhavato yonito gatito viññāṇaṭṭhitito sattāvāsato sattanikāyato
anya-e0102n:220_5: vā cuto puna amukasmiṃ nāma bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā udapādiṃ.
anya-e0102n:220_6: Tatrāpāsinti atha tatrāpi bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā puna ahosiṃ.
anya-e0102n:221_0: Apica yasmā amutrāsinti idaṃ anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:221_2: tasmā “idhūpapanno”ti imissā idhūpapattiyā anantaramevassa upapattiṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya “amutra udapādi”nti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:221_3: Tatrāpāsinti evamādi panassa tatra imissā upapattiyā anantare upapattiṭṭhāne nāmagottādīnaṃ anussaraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:221_4: So tato cuto idhūpapannoti svāhaṃ tato anantarūpapattiṭṭhānato cuto idha asukasmiṃ nāma khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā nibbattoti.
anya-e0102n:221_8: Nāmagottena hi satto tisso kassapoti uddisīyati.
anya-e0102n:224_1: Sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇakathāya cutūpapātañāṇāyāti cutiyā ca upapāte ca ñāṇāya.
anya-e0102n:224_2: Yena ñāṇena sattānaṃ cuti ca upapāto ca ñāyati,
anya-e0102n:224_4: Cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetīti parikammacittaṃ abhinīharati ceva abhininnāmeti ca.
anya-e0102n:224_7: Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:224_9: Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:224_10: Dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:225_9: so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati.
anya-e0102n:226_1: mānusakaṃ vā maṃsacakkhuṃ atikkantattā atikkantamānusakanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:226_3: Satte passatīti manussānaṃ maṃsacakkhunā viya satte oloketi.
anya-e0102n:227_0: Cavamāne upapajjamāneti ettha cutikkhaṇe upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunā daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā.
anya-e0102n:227_5: Te evarūpe cavamāne ca upapajjamāne ca passatīti dasseti.
anya-e0102n:228_0: Hīneti mohanissandayuttattā hīnānaṃ jātikulabhogādīnaṃ vasena hīḷite ohīḷite oññāte avaññāte.
anya-e0102n:229_5: idha bhikkhu heṭṭhā nirayābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nerayike satte passati mahādukkhamanubhavamāne.
anya-e0102n:229_7: So evaṃ manasikaroti “kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:229_8: Athassa idaṃ nāma katvāti taṃkammārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:229_9: Tathā uparidevalokābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nandanavanamissakavanaphārusakavanādīsu satte passati mahāsampattiṃ anubhavamāne.
anya-e0102n:229_11: So evaṃ manasikaroti “kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:229_12: Athassa idaṃ nāma katvāti taṃkammārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:229_17: Dibbacakkhupādakāneva hi imāni dibbacakkhunā saheva ijjhanti.
anya-e0102n:230_6: Ariyānaṃ upavādakāti buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ ariyānaṃ antamaso gihisotāpannānampi anatthakāmā hutvā
anya-e0102n:230_7: antimavatthunā vā guṇaparidhaṃsanena vā upavādakā akkosakā garahakāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:230_10: Natthi imesaṃ jhānaṃ vā vimokkho vā maggo vā phalaṃ vātiādīni vadanto guṇaparidhaṃsanavasena upavadatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:230_11: So ca jānaṃ vā upavadeyya ajānaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:231_0: Aññatarasmiṃ kira gāme eko thero ca daharabhikkhu ca piṇḍāya caranti.
anya-e0102n:231_6: So manussehi ummāratthāya āhaṭe dārukhaṇḍe nisīditvā pivi.
anya-e0102n:231_9: Thero gāme caritvā vihāraṃ gantvā daharabhikkhuṃ āha “atthi te, āvuso,
anya-e0102n:232_1: tena gantvā sace attanā vuḍḍhataro hoti,
anya-e0102n:232_5: vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0102n:232_9: sayaṃ vā gantvā saddhivihārikādike vā pesetvā khamāpetabbo.
anya-e0102n:233_3: tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sace navakatarā honti,
anya-e0102n:233_8: khamatu me so āyasmā”ti vatvā khamāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:234_3: ekassa paṇḍitassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0102n:234_10: Tenāpi ariyassa gatadisābhimukhena añjaliṃ paggahetvā khamatūti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:235_2: ye ca micchādiṭṭhimūlakesu kāyakammādīsu aññepi samādapenti.
anya-e0102n:235_3: Ettha ca vacīduccaritaggahaṇeneva ariyūpavāde manoduccaritaggahaṇena ca micchādiṭṭhiyā saṅgahitāyapi
anya-e0102n:235_4: imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puna vacanaṃ mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:235_9: bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṃ ārādheyya,
anya-e0102n:235_12: vadāmi taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto,
anya-e0102n:235_14: Micchādiṭṭhito ca mahāsāvajjataraṃ nāma aññaṃ natthi.
anya-e0102n:236_2: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā.
anya-e0102n:237_0: Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā apetattā,
anya-e0102n:237_3: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gatīti duggati.
anya-e0102n:237_5: Vinassantā vā ettha patanti saṃbhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgātipi vinipāto.
anya-e0102n:238_4: So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca,
anya-e0102n:238_8: So hi yathāvuttena atthena apāyo ceva duggati ca sabbasamussayehi ca vinipatitattā vinipātoti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:239_5: So sabbopi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti ayaṃ vacanattho.
anya-e0102n:241_1: Evaṃ passitukāmena pana ādikammikena kulaputtena kasiṇārammaṇaṃ abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ sabbākārena abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā “tejokasiṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:241_3: ālokakasiṇa”nti imesu tīsu kasiṇesu aññataraṃ āsannaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:241_9: Imesu ca pana tīsu ālokakasiṇaṃyeva seṭṭhataraṃ.
anya-e0102n:241_10: Tasmā taṃ vā itaresaṃ vā aññataraṃ kasiṇaniddese vuttanayena uppādetvā upacārabhūmiyaṃyeva ṭhatvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:242_1: Rūpagataṃ passato panassa parikammassa vāro atikkamati.
anya-e0102n:242_4: Athānena punappunaṃ pādakajjhānameva pavisitvā tato vuṭṭhāya āloko pharitabbo.
anya-e0102n:242_5: Evaṃ anukkamena āloko thāmagato hotīti ettha āloko hotūti yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchindati,
anya-e0102n:242_8: Rattiṃ tiṇukkāya maggapaṭipanno cettha puriso opammaṃ.
anya-e0102n:243_0: Eko kira rattiṃ tiṇukkāya maggaṃ paṭipajji.
anya-e0102n:243_3: So taṃ tiṇukkaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ghaṃsitvā tiṇukkā puna ujjālesi.
anya-e0102n:243_4: Sā pajjalitvā purimālokato mahantataraṃ ālokaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0102n:243_5: Evaṃ punappunaṃ vijjhātaṃ ujjālayato kamena sūriyo uṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n:243_6: Sūriye uṭṭhite ukkāya kammaṃ natthīti taṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi agamāsi.
anya-e0102n:243_8: Ukkāya vijjhātāya samavisamānaṃ adassanaṃ viya rūpagataṃ passato parikammassa vārātikkamena āloke antarahite rūpagatānaṃ adassanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:243_10: Ukkāya purimālokato mahantatarālokakaraṇaṃ viya puna parikammaṃ karoto balavatarālokapharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:243_12: Tiṇukkaṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi gamanaṃ viya parittālokaṃ chaḍḍetvā thāmagatenālokena divasampi rūpadassanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:244_0: Tattha yadā tassa bhikkhuno maṃsacakkhussa anāpāthagataṃ antokucchigataṃ hadayavatthunissitaṃ heṭṭhāpathavītalanissitaṃ
anya-e0102n:244_1: tirokuṭṭapabbatapākāragataṃ paracakkavāḷagatanti idaṃ rūpaṃ ñāṇacakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
anya-e0102n:245_0: Taṃ panetaṃ puthujjanassa paribandho hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:245_1: So hi yasmā yattha yattha āloko hotūti adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:245_2: taṃ taṃ pathavīsamuddapabbate vinivijjhitvāpi ekālokaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:245_3: athassa tattha bhayānakāni yakkharakkhasādirūpāni passato bhayaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:246_1: Vuttappakārametaṃ rūpamārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjane uppajjitvā niruddhe tadeva rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:246_2: cattāri pañca vā javanāni uppajjantīti sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:246_5: Tena sahajātaṃ ñāṇaṃ sattānaṃ cutūpapāte ñāṇantipi dibbacakkhuñāṇantipi vuccatīti.
anya-e0102n:250_0: Iti pañcakkhandhavidū, pañca abhiññā avoca yā nātho;
anya-e0102n:251_0: Tā ñatvā tāsu ayaṃ, pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyā.
anya-e0102n:252_1: tassa anāgataṃsañāṇañca yathākammupagañāṇañcāti dvepi paribhaṇḍañāṇāni honti.
anya-e0102n:252_2: Iti imāni ca dve iddhividhādīni ca pañcāti satta abhiññāñāṇāni idhāgatāni.
anya-e0102n:256_1: Tattha iddhividhañāṇaṃ parittamahaggataatītānāgatapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena sattasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:256_2: Tañhi yadā kāyaṃ cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena kāyena gantukāmo cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmeti,
anya-e0102n:256_4: tadā upayogaladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā rūpakāyārammaṇato parittārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:256_5: Yadā cittaṃ kāyasannissitaṃ katvā dissamānena kāyena gantukāmo kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmeti,
anya-e0102n:256_7: tadā upayogaladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā mahaggatacittārammaṇato mahaggatārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:257_0: Yasmā pana tadeva cittaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
anya-e0102n:257_2: Mahādhātunidhāne mahākassapattherādīnaṃ viya anāgataṃ adhiṭṭhahantānaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:257_3: Mahākassapatthero kira mahādhātunidhānaṃ karonto “anāgate aṭṭhārasavassādhikāni dvevassasatāni ime gandhā mā sussiṃsu,
anya-e0102n:257_7: Assaguttatthero vattaniyasenāsane bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sukkhabhattaṃ bhuñjamānaṃ disvā udakasoṇḍiṃ divase divase purebhatte dadhirasaṃ hotūti adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n:257_10: Kāyaṃ pana cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena kāyena gamanakāle paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:258_1: cittavasena vā kāyaṃ pariṇāmanakāle attano kumārakavaṇṇādinimmānakāle ca sakāyacittānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇato ajjhattārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:258_2: Bahiddhā hatthiassādidassanakāle pana bahiddhārammaṇanti evaṃ tāva iddhividhañāṇassa sattasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:259_5: Vijjamānaṃyeva pana saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanato paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:259_7: Paresaṃ saddasavanakāle bahiddhārammaṇanti evaṃ dibbasotadhātuñāṇassa catūsu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:261_0: Ettha ca puthujjano sotāpannassa cittaṃ na jānāti.
anya-e0102n:261_1: Sotāpanno vā sakadāgāmissāti evaṃ yāva arahato netabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:261_3: Aññopi ca uparimo heṭṭhimassāti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:261_5: Yadā pana atīte sattadivasabbhantare ca anāgate sattadivasabbhantare ca paresaṃ cittaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0102n:262_7: Tattha andhakāre nisīditvā ālokaṭṭhānaṃ gatassa na tāva ārammaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:262_10: Ālokaṭṭhāne vicaritvā ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassāpi na tāva sahasā rūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:262_14: ghaṇḍibherīākoṭanavikārañca disvāpi na tāva saddaṃ suṇāti,
anya-e0102n:263_0: Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana rūpasantati arūpasantatīti dve santatiyo vatvā udakaṃ akkamitvā gatassa yāva tīre akkantaudakalekhā na vippasīdati,
anya-e0102n:263_1: addhānato āgatassa yāva kāye usumabhāvo na vūpasammati,
anya-e0102n:263_2: ātapā āgantvā gabbhaṃ paviṭṭhassa yāva andhakārabhāvo na vigacchati,
anya-e0102n:263_3: antogabbhe kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā divā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokentassa yāva akkhīnaṃ phandanabhāvo na vūpasammati,
anya-e0102n:263_5: Dve tayo javanavārā arūpasantati nāmāti vatvā tadubhayampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāmāti vadanti.
anya-e0102n:264_2: mano ye ca dhammā ubhayametaṃ paccuppannaṃ,
anya-e0102n:264_3: tasmiṃ ce paccuppanne chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:265_0: Tattha keci khaṇapaccuppannaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hotīti vadanti.
anya-e0102n:265_2: Yasmā iddhimato ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0102n:265_4: yathā ākāse khitte pupphamuṭṭhimhi avassaṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ ekassa vaṇṭena vaṇṭaṃ paṭivijjhati,
anya-e0102n:265_5: evaṃ parassa cittaṃ jānissāmīti rāsivasena mahājanassa citte āvajjite avassaṃ ekassa cittaṃ ekena cittena
anya-e0102n:265_6: uppādakkhaṇe vā ṭhitikkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā paṭivijjhatīti.
anya-e0102n:265_7: Taṃ pana vassasatampi vassasahassampi āvajjanto yena ca cittena āvajjati,
anya-e0102n:265_9: Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sahaṭhānābhāvato āvajjanajavanānañca aniṭṭhaṭṭhāne nānārammaṇabhāvappattidosato ayuttanti aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0102n:266_0: Santatipaccuppannaṃ pana addhāpaccuppannañca ārammaṇaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:266_1: Tattha yaṃ vattamānajavanavīthito atītānāgatavasena dvittijavanavīthiparimāṇe kāle parassa cittaṃ,
anya-e0102n:267_2: āvajjanaṃ khaṇapaccuppannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā teneva saha nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:267_6: tesaṃ sabbesampi tadeva niruddhaṃ cittamārammaṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:267_9: Ekārammaṇattepi ca iddhicittameva parassa cittaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0102n:267_13: Iti idaṃ santatipaccuppannassa ceva addhāpaccuppannassa ca vasena paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:267_16: Parassa cittārammaṇattāyeva pana bahiddhārammaṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa aṭṭhasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:268_4: Atīte attanā parehi vā bhāvitamaggaṃ sacchikataphalañca anussaraṇakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:269_1: atha kho tesaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa sattadivasabbhantarātītaṃ cittameva ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:269_2: Tañhi aññaṃ khandhaṃ vā khandhapaṭibaddhaṃ vā na jānāti.
anya-e0102n:269_5: Pubbenivāsañāṇassa pana atītā khandhā khandhapaṭibaddhañca kiñci anārammaṇaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:269_6: Tañhi atītakkhandhakhandhapaṭibaddhesu dhammesu sabbaññutaññāṇagatikaṃ hotīti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:269_8: Yasmā pana “kusalā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammupagañāṇassa
anya-e0102n:269_10: Tasmā cattāropi khandhā cetopariyañāṇayathākammupagañāṇānaṃ ārammaṇā honti.
anya-e0102n:270_4: pitā bandhumā”tiādinā nayena nāmagottapathavīnimittādianussaraṇakāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:270_5: Nāmagottanti cettha khandhūpanibandho sammutisiddho byañjanattho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0102n:270_10: Evaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇassa aṭṭhasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:271_7: Parassa rūpadassanakāle bahiddhārammaṇanti evaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇassa catūsu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:272_2: Tañhi “ayaṃ anāgate kāmāvacare nibbattissatī”ti jānanakāle parittārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:273_1: atha kho tassa sattadivasabbhantarānāgataṃ cittameva ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:273_2: Tañhi aññaṃ khandhaṃ vā khandhapaṭibaddhaṃ vā na jānāti.
anya-e0102n:273_3: Anāgataṃsañāṇassa pubbenivāsañāṇe vuttanayena anāgate anārammaṇaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:273_8: Brahmavatī nāma brāhmaṇī mātā”tiādinā pana nayena nāmagottajānanakāle pubbenivāsañāṇe vuttanayeneva na
anya-e0102n:273_9: vattabbārammaṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇassa aṭṭhasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:274_7: Evaṃ yathākammupagañāṇassa pañcasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:274_9: taṃ kālena ajjhattaṃ kālena bahiddhā jānanakāle ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇampi hotiyevāti.
anya-e0102n:280_1: Idāni yasmā evaṃ abhiññāvasena adhigatānisaṃsāya thiratarāya samādhibhāvanāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño,
anya-e0102n:280_2: cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayanti ettha cittasīsena niddiṭṭho samādhi sabbākārena bhāvito hoti.
