anya-e0102n:1326_13: aniccatāti imāni pana dasa rūpāni na sammasanupagāni,
anya-e0102n:1326_17: Apica kho rūpānaṃ ākāravikāraantaraparicchedamattato rūpanti saṅkhaṃ gatāni.
anya-e0102n:1326_18: Iti sabbāni petāni sattavīsati rūpāni rūpakkhandho,
anya-e0102n:1326_19: ekāsītiyā lokiyacittehi saddhiṃ uppannā vedanā vedanākkhandho,
anya-e0102n:1326_24: cattāro arūpino khandhā nāmanti evameko pañcakkhandhavasena nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1327_1: Aparo “yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti evaṃ saṃkhitteneva
anya-e0102n:1327_3: tathā manāyatanañceva dhammāyatanekadesañca nāmanti pariggahetvā “iti idañca nāmaṃ idañca rūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1327_4: idaṃ vuccati nāmarūpa”nti saṅkhepato nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1328_1: Sace panassa tena tena mukhena rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ pariggaṇhato sukhumattā arūpaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:1328_2: tena dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā rūpameva punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ manasikātabbaṃ pariggahetabbaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1328_3: Yathā yathā hissa rūpaṃ suvikkhālitaṃ hoti nijjaṭaṃ suparisuddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1328_4: tathā tathā tadārammaṇā arūpadhammā sayameva pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0102n:1329_0: Yathā hi cakkhumato purisassa aparisuddhe ādāse mukhanimittaṃ olokentassa nimittaṃ na paññāyati,
anya-e0102n:1329_1: so “nimittaṃ na paññāyatī”ti na ādāsaṃ chaḍḍeti,
anya-e0102n:1329_3: Tassa parisuddhe ādāse nimittaṃ sayameva pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1329_4: Yathā ca telatthiko tilapiṭṭhaṃ doṇiyaṃ ākiritvā udakena paripphosetvā ekavāraṃ dvevāraṃ pīḷanamattena tele anikkhamante na tilapiṭṭhaṃ chaḍḍeti,
anya-e0102n:1329_5: atha kho naṃ punappunaṃ uṇhodakena paripphosetvā madditvā pīḷeti.
anya-e0102n:1329_7: Yathā vā pana udakaṃ pasādetukāmo katakaṭṭhiṃ gahetvā antoghaṭe hatthaṃ otāretvā ekadvevāre ghaṃsanamattena
anya-e0102n:1329_12: evamevaṃ tena bhikkhunā dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā rūpameva punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ manasikātabbaṃ pariggahetabbaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1330_0: Yathā yathā hissa rūpaṃ suvikkhālitaṃ hoti nijjaṭaṃ suparisuddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1330_2: kaddamupari udakaṃ viya cittaṃ pasannaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1330_4: Evaṃ aññāhipi ucchucoragoṇadadhimacchādīhi upamāhi ayamattho pakāsetabbo.
anya-e0102n:1332_1: Evaṃ suvisuddharūpapariggahassa panassa arūpadhammā tīhi ākārehi upaṭṭhahanti phassavasena vā vedanāvasena vā viññāṇavasena vā. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1332_2: Ekassa tāva “pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”tiādinā nayena dhātuyo pariggaṇhantassa paṭhamābhinipāto phasso,
anya-e0102n:1333_2: taṃsampayutto phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandho,
anya-e0102n:1334_3: phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1334_5: assāsapassāse pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”ti ārammaṇapaṭivijānanaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho,
anya-e0102n:1334_8: phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1335_0: Eteneva upāyena “kammasamuṭṭhāne kese pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”tiādinā nayena dvācattālīsāya dhātukoṭṭhāsesu catunnaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena,
anya-e0102n:1335_1: sesesu ca cakkhudhātuādīsu rūpapariggahamukhesu sabbaṃ nayabhedaṃ anugantvā yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0102n:1336_1: Yasmā ca evaṃ suvisuddharūpapariggahasseva tassa arūpadhammā tīhākārehi pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0102n:1336_4: Sace hi ekasmiṃ vā rūpadhamme upaṭṭhite dvīsu vā rūpaṃ pahāya arūpapariggahaṃ ārabhati kammaṭṭhānato parihāyati,
anya-e0102n:1336_6: Suvisuddharūpapariggahassa pana arūpapariggahāya yogaṃ karoto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0102n:1337_0: So evaṃ phassādīnaṃ vasena upaṭṭhite cattāro arūpino khandhe nāmanti,
anya-e0102n:1337_3: Iti aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo dvādasāyatanāni pañcakkhandhāti sabbepi tebhūmake dhamme khaggena samuggaṃ vivaramāno
anya-e0102n:1337_4: viya yamakatālakandaṃ phālayamāno viya ca nāmañca rūpañcāti dvedhā vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1337_5: Nāmarūpamattato uddhaṃ añño satto vā puggalo vā devo vā brahmā vā natthīti niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:1339_1: So evaṃ yāthāvasarasato nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā suṭṭhutaraṃ “satto puggalo”ti imissā lokasamaññāya pahānatthāya
anya-e0102n:1339_2: sattasammohassa samatikkamatthāya asammohabhūmiyaṃ cittaṃ ṭhapanatthāya sambahulasuttantavasena “nāmarūpamattamevidaṃ,  na satto,
anya-e0102n:1339_3: na puggalo atthī”ti etamatthaṃ saṃsandetvā vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1341_0: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammutī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1342_2: kaṭṭhañca paṭicca valliñca paṭicca mattikañca paṭicca tiṇañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito agārantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0102n:1342_4: aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca maṃsañca paṭicca cammañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1344_0: “Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti ca;
anya-e0102n:1345_0: Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhatī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1347_3: Tasmā yathā akkhacakkapañjaraīsādīsu aṅgasambhāresu ekenākārena saṇṭhitesu rathoti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1347_4: paramatthato ekekasmiṃ aṅge upaparikkhiyamāne ratho nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:1347_5: Yathā ca kaṭṭhādīsu gehasambhāresu ekenākārena ākāsaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitesu gehanti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1347_7: Yathā ca aṅguliaṅguṭṭhādīsu ekenākārena ṭhitesu muṭṭhīti vohāramattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1347_11: Khandhasākhāpalāsādīsu ekenākārena ṭhitesu rukkhoti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1347_12: paramatthato ekekasmiṃ avayave upaparikkhiyamāne rukkho nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:1347_15: paramatthato ekekasmiṃ dhamme upaparikkhiyamāne “asmīti vā ahanti vā”ti gāhassa vatthubhūto satto nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:1347_17: Evaṃ passato hi dassanaṃ yathābhūtadassanaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:1348_1: Yo panetaṃ yathābhūtadassanaṃ pahāya “satto atthī”ti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0102n:1348_2: So tassa vināsaṃ anujāneyya avināsaṃ vā.
anya-e0102n:1348_5: Khīranvayassa dadhino viya tadanvayassa aññassa abhāvato.
anya-e0102n:1350_6: Tesaṃ bhavanirodhāya dhamme desiyamāne cittaṃ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati. Evaṃ kho,
anya-e0102n:1351_3: Bhaveneva kho paneke aṭṭīyamānā harāyamānā jigucchamānā vibhavaṃ abhinandanti,
anya-e0102n:1351_4: yato kira bho ayaṃ attā kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
anya-e0102n:1352_5: bhūtaṃ bhūtato disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti. Evaṃ kho,
anya-e0102n:1353_1: Tasmā yathā dāruyantaṃ suññaṃ nijjīvaṃ nirīhakaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1353_2: atha ca pana dārurajjukasamāyogavasena gacchatipi tiṭṭhatipi.
anya-e0102n:1353_5: atha ca pana aññamaññasamāyogavasena gacchatipi tiṭṭhatipi.
anya-e0102n:1355_0: Na hettha satto manujo ca vijjati;
anya-e0102n:1358_2: yathā hi dvīsu naḷakalāpīsu aññamaññaṃ nissāya ṭhapitāsu ekā ekissā upatthambho hoti,
anya-e0102n:1358_4: evamevaṃ pañcavokārabhave nāmarūpaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya pavattati,
anya-e0102n:1361_1: Yathā ca daṇḍābhihataṃ bheriṃ nissāya sadde pavattamāne aññā bherī,
anya-e0102n:1361_6: evamevaṃ vatthudvārārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya nāme pavattamāne aññaṃ rūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1361_11: apica kho bheriṃ paṭicca saddo viya rūpaṃ paṭicca nāmaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0102n:1378_1: Apicettha nāmaṃ nittejaṃ na sakena tejena pavattituṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:1378_6: Rūpampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena pavattituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n:1378_11: atha kho nāmaṃ nissāya rūpaṃ pavattati,
anya-e0102n:1378_13: nāmassa khāditukāmatāya pivitukāmatāya byāharitukāmatāya iriyāpathaṃ kappetukāmatāya sati rūpaṃ khādati, pivati,
anya-e0102n:1379_0: Imassa panatthassa vibhāvanatthāya imaṃ upamaṃ udāharanti –
anya-e0102n:1379_1: yathā jaccandho ca pīṭhasappī ca disāpakkamitukāmā assu,
anya-e0102n:1379_4: natthi ca me cakkhūni yehi samavisamaṃ passeyya”nti.
anya-e0102n:1379_7: natthi ca me pādāni yehi abhikkameyyaṃ vā paṭikkameyyaṃ vā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1379_8: So tuṭṭhahaṭṭho jaccandho pīṭhasappiṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ āropesi.
anya-e0102n:1379_9: Pīṭhasappī jaccandhassa aṃsakūṭe nisīditvā evamāha “vāmaṃ muñca dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇha,
anya-e0102n:1379_11: Tattha jaccandhopi nittejo dubbalo na sakena tejena sakena balena gacchati,
anya-e0102n:1379_12: pīṭhasappīpi nittejo dubbalo na sakena tejena sakena balena gacchati,
anya-e0102n:1379_13: na ca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya gamanaṃ nappavattati,
anya-e0102n:1379_14: evamevaṃ nāmampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1379_16: Rūpampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1379_18: na ca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya uppatti vā pavatti vā na hoti.
anya-e0102n:1390_0: “Yathā ca manusse nissāya, nāvā gacchati aṇṇave;
anya-e0102n:1392_0: “Ubho nissāya gacchanti, manussā nāvā ca aṇṇave;
anya-e0102n:1394_0: Evaṃ nānānayehi nāmarūpaṃ vavatthāpayato sattasaññaṃ abhibhavitvā asammohabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ yāthāvadassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1401_1: Etasseva pana nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṇena tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:1402_0: Taṃ sampādetukāmo bhikkhu yathā nāma kusalo bhisakko rogaṃ disvā tassa samuṭṭhānaṃ pariyesati.
anya-e0102n:1402_1: Yathā vā pana anukampako puriso daharaṃ kumāraṃ mandaṃ uttānaseyyakaṃ rathikāya nipannaṃ disvā “kassa
anya-e0102n:1402_2: nu kho ayaṃ puttako”ti tassa mātāpitaro āvajjati,
anya-e0102n:1403_0: So āditova iti paṭisañcikkhati “na tāvidhaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ahetukaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1404_1: So evaṃ nāmarūpassa hetupaccaye āvajjetvā imassa tāva rūpakāyassa evaṃ hetupaccaye pariggaṇhāti –
anya-e0102n:1404_2: “ayaṃ kāyo nibbattamāno neva uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkasogandhikādīnaṃ abbhantare nibbattati,
anya-e0102n:1404_4: atha kho āmāsayapakkāsayānaṃ antare udarapaṭalaṃ pacchato piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ purato katvā antaantaguṇaparivārito
anya-e0102n:1404_7: Tassevaṃ nibbattamānassa ‘avijjā taṇhā upādānaṃ kamma’nti ime cattāro dhammā nibbattakattā hetu,
anya-e0102n:1404_8: āhāro upatthambhakattā paccayoti pañca dhammā hetupaccayā honti.
anya-e0102n:1404_9: Tesupi avijjādayo tayo imassa kāyassa mātā viya dārakassa upanissayā honti.
anya-e0102n:1404_13: puna “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādinā nayena nāmakāyassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1405_0: So evaṃ paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā yathā idaṃ etarahi,
anya-e0102n:1406_1: Tassevaṃ samanupassato yā sā pubbantaṃ ārabbha “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1406_5: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”nti pañcavidhā vicikicchā vuttā,
anya-e0102n:1406_6: yāpi aparantaṃ ārabbha “bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1406_10: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhāna”nti pañcavidhā vicikicchā vuttā,
anya-e0102n:1406_11: yāpi paccuppannaṃ ārabbha “etarahi vā pana paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī hoti –
anya-e0102n:1406_16: ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
anya-e0102n:1406_17: so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatī”ti chabbidhā vicikicchā vuttā,
anya-e0102n:1407_1: Aparo sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavasena duvidhaṃ nāmassa paccayaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:1407_3: Duvidho hi nāmassa paccayo sādhāraṇo asādhāraṇo ca.
anya-e0102n:1407_5: rūpādīni cha ārammaṇāni nāmassa sādhāraṇo paccayo,
anya-e0102n:1408_0: Rūpassa pana kammaṃ cittaṃ utu āhāroti ayaṃ kammādiko catubbidho paccayo.
anya-e0102n:1408_1: Tattha kammaṃ atītameva kammasamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1409_0: So evaṃ paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā yathā idaṃ etarahi,
anya-e0102n:1409_3: Tassevaṃ samanupassato vuttanayeneva tīsupi addhāsu vicikicchā pahīyati.
anya-e0102n:1410_1: Aparo tesaṃyeva nāmarūpasaṅkhātānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ jarāpattiṃ jiṇṇānañca bhaṅgaṃ disvā idaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma jātiyā sati hoti,
anya-e0102n:1410_11: saṅkhārā avijjāya satīti evaṃ paṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1411_1: Aparo “iti kho avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti pubbe vitthāretvā dassitaanulomapaṭiccasamuppādavaseneva nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1412_5: cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā,
anya-e0102n:1412_10: vedayitaṃ vedanāti ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā.
anya-e0102n:1412_12: cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti evaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena
anya-e0102n:1413_6: Tesu ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā diṭṭhidhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:1413_10: natthi kammavipāko”ti imassa tikassa vasena ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:1413_13: Tathā asakkontaṃ vuttanayeneva ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:1413_14: Ubhinnaṃ antare pañca javanacetanā aparāpariyavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:1413_17: Sati saṃsārappavattiyā ahosikammaṃ nāma na hoti.
anya-e0102n:1414_6: Tattha kusalaṃ vā hotu akusalaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1414_7: garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ mātughātādikammaṃ vā mahaggatakammaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1414_9: Tathā bahulābahulesupi yaṃ bahulaṃ hoti susīlyaṃ vā dussīlyaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1414_14: Etehi pana tīhi muttaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ nāma hoti,
anya-e0102n:1415_5: Tattha janakaṃ nāma kusalampi hoti akusalampi.
anya-e0102n:1415_7: Upatthambhakaṃ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:1415_8: aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjamānakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti,
anya-e0102n:1415_10: Upapīḷakaṃ aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjamānakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādhati,
anya-e0102n:1415_12: Upaghātakaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalampi akusalampi samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1415_13: Evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1416_0: Iti imesaṃ dvādasannaṃ kammānaṃ kammantarañceva vipākantarañca buddhānaṃ kammavipākañāṇasseva yāthāvasarasato pākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1416_2: Vipassakena pana kammantarañca vipākantarañca ekadesato jānitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1417_1: Iti imaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ kammaṃ kammavaṭṭe pakkhipitvā evaṃ eko kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1417_2: So evaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā “yathā idaṃ etarahi,
anya-e0102n:1417_3: evaṃ atītepi addhāne kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena paccayato pavattittha,
anya-e0102n:1419_0: Kammā punabbhavo hoti, evaṃ loko pavattatīti. –
anya-e0102n:1420_1: Tassevaṃ samanupassato yā sā pubbantādayo ārabbha “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinā nayena vuttā soḷasavidhā vicikicchā,
anya-e0102n:1420_4: So neva kāraṇato uddhaṃ kārakaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:1420_7: vipākappavattiyā sati “paṭisaṃvedako”ti samaññāmattena paṇḍitā voharanticcevassa sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1431_0: Taṇhāsotena vuyhantā, na te dukkhā pamuccare.
anya-e0102n:1434_0: “Kammaṃ natthi vipākamhi, pāko kamme na vijjati;
anya-e0102n:1435_0: Aññamaññaṃ ubho suññā, na ca kammaṃ vinā phalaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1436_0: “Yathā na sūriye aggi, na maṇimhi na gomaye;
anya-e0102n:1437_0: Na tesaṃ bahi so atthi, sambhārehi ca jāyati.
anya-e0102n:1439_0: Bahiddhāpi na kammassa, na kammaṃ tattha vijjati.
anya-e0102n:1440_0: “Phalena suññaṃ taṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ kamme na vijjati;
anya-e0102n:1441_0: Kammañca kho upādāya, tato nibbattate phalaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1444_1: Tassevaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ katvā tīsu addhāsu pahīnavicikicchassa
anya-e0102n:1445_3: atītakammapaccayā pana imasmiṃ bhave aññe nibbattā,
anya-e0102n:1445_4: atītabhavato imaṃ bhavaṃ āgato ekadhammopi natthi,
anya-e0102n:1445_5: imasmimpi bhave kammapaccayena nibbattā khandhā nirujjhissanti,
anya-e0102n:1445_7: imamhā bhavā punabbhavaṃ ekadhammopi na gamissati.
anya-e0102n:1445_8: Apica kho yathā na ācariyamukhato sajjhāyo antevāsikassa mukhaṃ pavisati,
anya-e0102n:1445_9: na ca tappaccayā tassa mukhe sajjhāyo na vattati,
anya-e0102n:1445_10: na dūtena mantodakaṃ pītaṃ rogino udaraṃ pavisati,
anya-e0102n:1445_11: na ca tassa tappaccayā rogo na vūpasammati,
anya-e0102n:1445_12: na mukhe maṇḍanavidhānaṃ ādāsatalādīsu mukhanimittaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0102n:1445_13: na ca tattha tappaccayā maṇḍanavidhānaṃ na paññāyati,
anya-e0102n:1445_14: na ekissā vaṭṭiyā dīpasikhā aññaṃ vaṭṭiṃ saṅkamati,
anya-e0102n:1445_15: na ca tattha tappaccayā dīpasikhā na nibbattati,
anya-e0102n:1445_17: ito vā punabbhavaṃ koci dhammo saṅkamati,
anya-e0102n:1445_19: idha vā khandhāyatanadhātupaccayā punabbhave khandhāyatanadhātuyo na nibbattantīti.
anya-e0102n:1447_0: Na ceva āgataṃ nāpi, na nibbattaṃ anantaraṃ.
anya-e0102n:1449_0: Purimaṃ bhijjate cittaṃ, pacchimaṃ jāyate tato.
anya-e0102n:1450_0: Tesaṃ antarikā natthi, vīci tesaṃ na vijjati;
anya-e0102n:1451_0: Na cito gacchati kiñci, paṭisandhi ca jāyatīti.
anya-e0102n:1452_1: Evaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena viditasabbadhammassa sabbākārena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahañāṇaṃ thāmagataṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1452_6: Evaṃ nānānayehi nāmarūpapaccayapariggahaṇena tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1453_2: Ubhopete dhammā paccayasamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n:1454_0: “Aniccato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati,
anya-e0102n:1454_2: kathaṃ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti,
anya-e0102n:1454_5: anattato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati…pe…
anya-e0102n:1455_2: Evaṃ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti.
anya-e0102n:1455_4: Dukkhato manasikaronto pavattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati…pe…
anya-e0102n:1455_5: anattato manasikaronto nimittañca pavattañca yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati,
anya-e0102n:1455_7: Evaṃ tadanvayena sabbe dhammā anattato sudiṭṭhā honti.
anya-e0102n:1456_0: “Yañca yathābhūtañāṇaṃ yañca sammādassanaṃ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā,
anya-e0102n:1456_1: ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca,
anya-e0102n:1456_3: Yañca yathābhūtañāṇaṃ yañca sammādassanaṃ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā,
anya-e0102n:1457_0: Iminā pana ñāṇena samannāgato vipassako buddhasāsane laddhassāso laddhapatiṭṭho niyatagatiko cūḷasotāpanno nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:1458_0: Tasmā bhikkhu sadā sato, nāmarūpassa sabbaso;
anya-e0102n:1466_2: ayaṃ na maggoti evaṃ maggañca amaggañca ñatvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ pana maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:1467_0: Taṃ sampādetukāmena kalāpasammasanasaṅkhātāya nayavipassanāya tāva yogo karaṇīyo. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:1467_2: Āraddhavipassakassa hi obhāsādīsu sambhūtesu maggāmaggañāṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1467_5: Apica yasmā tīraṇapariññāya vattamānāya maggāmaggañāṇaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1467_7: tasmāpi taṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ sampādetukāmena kalāpasammasane tāva yogo kātabbo.
anya-e0102n:1468_2: tisso hi lokiyapariññā ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññā ca.
anya-e0102n:1468_7: vedayitalakkhaṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena pavattā paññā ñātapariññā nāma.
anya-e0102n:1468_9: vedanā aniccā”tiādinā nayena tesaṃyeva dhammānaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanā paññā tīraṇapariññā nāma.
anya-e0102n:1468_10: Tesuyeva pana dhammesu niccasaññādipajahanavasena pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanā paññā pahānapariññā nāma.
anya-e0102n:1469_0: Tattha saṅkhāraparicchedato paṭṭhāya yāva paccayapariggahā ñātapariññāya bhūmi.
anya-e0102n:1469_1: Etasmiṃ hi antare dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva ādhipaccaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1469_2: Kalāpasammasanato pana paṭṭhāya yāva udayabbayānupassanā tīraṇapariññāya bhūmi.
anya-e0102n:1469_3: Etasmiṃ hi antare sāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva ādhipaccaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1469_4: Bhaṅgānupassanaṃ ādiṃ katvā upari pahānapariññāya bhūmi.
anya-e0102n:1469_5: Tato paṭṭhāya hi aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati,
anya-e0102n:1469_11: paṭinissajjanto ādānaṃ pajahatīti evaṃ niccasaññādipahānasādhikānaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1469_12: Iti imāsu tīsu pariññāsu saṅkhāraparicchedassa ceva paccayapariggahassa ca sādhitattā iminā yoginā ñātapariññāva adhigatā hoti,
anya-e0102n:1469_14: Tena vuttaṃ “yasmā tīraṇapariññāya vattamānāya maggāmaggañāṇaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1469_16: tasmāpi taṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ sampādetukāmena kalāpasammasane tāva yogo kātabbo”ti.
anya-e0102n:1471_0: “Kathaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1473_2: anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ. Vedanaṃ… viññāṇaṃ…
anya-e0102n:1474_0: “Rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ
anya-e0102n:1474_1: nirodhadhammanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ. Vedanaṃ… viññāṇaṃ… cakkhuṃ…
anya-e0102n:1474_3: nirodhadhammanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1475_1: asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1475_4: asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1475_7: asati avijjāya natthi saṅkhārāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1475_10: asati avijjāya natthi saṅkhārāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1476_2: Tena vuccati atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n:1477_1: jarāmaraṇanti iminā peyyālena dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattā dhammā,
anya-e0102n:1477_24: dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānīti ime dhammarāsayo saṃkhittāti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1479_9: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1479_11: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1482_0: “Pathavīdhātu…pe… viññāṇadhātu… pathavīkasiṇaṃ…pe… viññāṇakasiṇaṃ… kesā…pe… muttaṃ… matthaluṅgaṃ….
anya-e0102n:1486_0: Taṃ tattha evaṃ vitthārena vuttattā idha sabbaṃ peyyālena saṃkhittaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1486_1: Evaṃ saṃkhitte panettha ye lokuttarā dhammā āgatā,
anya-e0102n:1486_2: te asammasanupagattā imasmiṃ adhikāre na gahetabbā.
anya-e0102n:1486_4: tesu ye yassa pākaṭā honti sukhena pariggahaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0102n:1487_7: Ettāvatā ayaṃ bhikkhu “yaṃkiñci rūpa”nti evaṃ aniyamaniddiṭṭhaṃ sabbampi rūpaṃ atītattikena ceva catūhi
anya-e0102n:1487_8: ca ajjhattādidukehīti ekādasahi okāsehi paricchinditvā sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato vavatthapeti,
anya-e0102n:1488_0: Kathaṃ? Parato vuttanayena. Vuttañhetaṃ – “rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1490_2: na tato paraṃ bhavaṃ gamissatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n:1491_0: Yaṃ paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ, tampi idheva khīyati, na ito gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n:1492_0: Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ, tampi ajjhattameva khīyati, na bahiddhābhāvaṃ gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n:1493_5: na dūrabhāvaṃ gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1494_0: Idaṃ sabbampi “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti etassa vasena ekaṃ sammasanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1495_3: taṃ bhayāvahaṃ hoti sīhopamasutte devānaṃ viya.
anya-e0102n:1495_4: Iti idampi “dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhenā”ti etassa vasena ekaṃ sammasanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1496_2: Asārakaṭṭhenāti “attā nivāsī kārako vedako sayaṃvasī”ti evaṃ parikappitassa attasārassa abhāvena.
anya-e0102n:1496_4: taṃ attanopi aniccataṃ vā udayabbayapīḷanaṃ vā vāretuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:1496_10: Iti idampi “anattā asārakaṭṭhenā”ti etassa vasena ekaṃ sammasanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1497_4: nānākārehi vā manasikārappavattidassanatthaṃ “rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ
anya-e0102n:1497_5: khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhamma”nti puna pāḷi vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1499_1: So tasseva pañcasu khandhesu aniccadukkhānattasammasanassa thirabhāvatthāya,
anya-e0102n:1499_2: yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā “katamehi cattārīsāya ākārehi anulomikaṃ khantiṃ paṭilabhati,
anya-e0102n:1499_3: katamehi cattārīsāya ākārehi sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatī”ti etassa vibhaṅge –
anya-e0102n:1500_0: “Pañcakkhandhe aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, parato, palokato, ītito,
anya-e0102n:1502_1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodho niccaṃ nibbānanti passanto sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatī”tiādinā nayena,
anya-e0102n:1504_29: Byādhijarāmaraṇehi ceva lābhālābhādīhi ca lokadhammehi pacalitatāya calato.
anya-e0102n:1504_30: Upakkamena ceva sarasena ca pabhaṅgupagamanasīlatāya pabhaṅguto.
anya-e0102n:1504_40: appakampi hi loke tucchanti vuccati. Sāmi- nivāsi- kāraka-
anya-e0102n:1504_45: atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti gacchati pavattatīti ādīnavo,
anya-e0102n:1504_48: Jarāya ceva maraṇena cāti dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāya vipariṇāmadhammato.
anya-e0102n:1504_62: Taṇhādiṭṭhiduccaritasaṃkilesānaṃ visayadhammatāya saṃkilesikadhammatoti evaṃ pabhedato vuttassa aniccādisammasanassa vasena sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1505_7: maraṇadhammatoti ekekasmiṃ khandhe dasa dasa katvā paññāsa aniccānupassanāni. Parato, rittato, tucchato, suññato,
anya-e0102n:1505_8: anattatoti ekekasmiṃ khandhe pañca pañca katvā pañcavīsati anattānupassanāni.
anya-e0102n:1505_10: rogatotiādīni ekekasmiṃ khandhe pañcavīsati pañcavīsati katvā pañcavīsatisataṃ dukkhānupassanānīti.
anya-e0102n:1506_0: Iccassa iminā dvisatabhedena aniccādisammasanena pañcakkhandhe sammasato taṃ nayavipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ aniccadukkhānattasammasanaṃ thiraṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1508_1: Yassa pana evaṃ nayavipassanāya yogaṃ karotopi nayavipassanā na sampajjati,
anya-e0102n:1508_9: kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhataṃ upaṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1508_11: antarā ca abyosānenā”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ navannaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena indriyāni tikkhāni katvā pathavīkasiṇaniddese
anya-e0102n:1508_12: vuttanayena satta asappāyāni vajjetvā satta sappāyāni sevamānena kālena rūpaṃ sammasitabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1510_2: idaṃ rūpaṃ nāma kammādivasena catūhi kāraṇehi nibbattati.
anya-e0102n:1510_3: Tattha sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ rūpaṃ nibbattamānaṃ paṭhamaṃ kammato nibbattati.
anya-e0102n:1510_4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva hi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ tāva tisantativasena vatthu- kāya-
anya-e0102n:1511_7: Rūpe dharanteyeva hi soḷasavāre bhavaṅgacittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1511_14: Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya dutiyaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1511_15: Tena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya tatiyaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1511_17: Āsannamaraṇassa pana ekameva ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya soḷasa cittāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n:1512_0: Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ rūpaṃ paṭisandhicittato uddhaṃ soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1512_1: Ṭhānakkhaṇe uppannaṃ sattarasamassa uppādakkhaṇena saddhiṃ nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1512_2: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ sattarasamassa ṭhānakkhaṇaṃ patvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1512_5: Opapātikānampi sattasantativasena sattati rūpāni evameva pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:1513_13: Kammapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma kammasamuṭṭhānarūpesu ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1513_14: tatrāpi ojā ṭhānaṃ patvā aññanti evaṃ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1513_15: Kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma kammajatejodhātu ṭhānappattā utusamuṭṭhānaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1513_16: tatrāpi utu aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakanti evaṃ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1517_3: kusalakiriyato dve abhiññācittānīti dvattiṃsa cittāni rūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1517_20: cattāri āruppavipākānīti soḷasa cittāni neva rūpaṃ janayanti,
anya-e0102n:1517_28: tasmā taṃ tadā purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:1518_7: Cittapaccayaṃ nāma “pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1518_8: Cittapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma cittasamuṭṭhānarūpesu ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1518_10: Cittapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma cittasamuṭṭhāno utu ṭhānappatto aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1519_7: Āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma upādiṇṇaṃ kammajarūpaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā tattha patiṭṭhāya ṭhānappattāya ojāya samuṭṭhāpitaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1519_11: Āhārapaccayaṃ nāma “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1519_12: Āhārapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āhārasamuṭṭhānesu rūpesu ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1519_13: tatrāpi ojā aññanti evaṃ dasadvādasavāre pavattiṃ ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1519_15: Dibbā pana ojā ekamāsaṃ dvemāsampi upatthambheti.
anya-e0102n:1519_16: Mātarā paribhuttāhāropi dārakassa sarīraṃ pharitvā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:1519_20: tatrāpi ojā aññaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti evaṃ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1519_21: Āhārapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āhārasamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu ṭhānappattā utusamuṭṭhānaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:1519_22: Tatrāyaṃ āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṃ janako hutvā paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1519_23: sesānaṃ nissayāhāraatthiavigatavasenāti evaṃ āhārajarūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n:1520_7: uṇhautu sītautūti evaṃ panesa duvidho hoti.
anya-e0102n:1520_8: Utusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma catusamuṭṭhāno utu upādiṇṇakaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā ṭhānappatto sarīre rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:1520_13: Utupaccayaṃ nāma utu catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ pavattiyā ca vināsassa ca paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1520_14: Utupaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma utusamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu ṭhānappattā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1520_15: tatrāpi utu aññanti evaṃ dīghampi addhānaṃ anupādiṇṇapakkhe ṭhatvāpi utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0102n:1520_16: Utupaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma utusamuṭṭhānā ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1520_17: tatrāpi ojā aññanti evaṃ dasadvādasavāre pavattiṃ ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1520_18: Tatrāyaṃ utu utusamuṭṭhānānaṃ janako hutvā paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1520_19: sesānaṃ nissayaatthiavigatavasenāti evaṃ utujarūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n:1520_20: Evañhi rūpassa nibbattiṃ passanto kālena rūpaṃ sammasati nāma.
anya-e0102n:1522_2: evaṃ arūpaṃ sammasantenapi arūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n:1523_1: idañhi arūpaṃ nāma purimabhave āyūhitakammavasena paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva ekūnavīsaticittuppādappabhedaṃ nibbattati.
anya-e0102n:1524_0: Pavatte pana asambhinnattā cakkhussa āpāthagatattā rūpānaṃ ālokasannissitaṃ manasikārahetukaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nibbattati saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi.
anya-e0102n:1524_1: Cakkhupasādassa hi ṭhitikkhaṇe ṭhitippattameva rūpaṃ cakkhuṃ ghaṭṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1524_2: Tasmiṃ ghaṭṭite dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅgaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1524_3: Tato tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1524_4: Tadanantaraṃ tadeva rūpaṃ passamānaṃ kusalavipākaṃ akusalavipākaṃ vā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1524_7: Tato tadeva rūpaṃ vavatthāpayamānā kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatā.
anya-e0102n:1524_8: Tato paraṃ kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyacittesu ekaṃ vā upekkhāsahagatāhetukaṃ cittaṃ pañca satta vā javanāni.
anya-e0102n:1524_9: Tato kāmāvacarasattānaṃ ekādasasu tadārammaṇacittesu javanānurūpaṃ yaṃkiñci tadārammaṇanti.
anya-e0102n:1524_12: Evaṃ chasu dvāresu arūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n:1524_13: Evañhi arūpassa nibbattiṃ passanto kālena arūpaṃ sammasati nāma.
anya-e0102n:1525_0: Evaṃ kālena rūpaṃ kālena arūpaṃ sammasitvāpi tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā anukkamena paṭipajjamāno eko paññābhāvanaṃ sampādeti.
anya-e0102n:1527_1: Aparo rūpasattakaarūpasattakavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1527_8: dhammatārūpatoti imehi ākārehi āropetvā sammasanto rūpasattakavasena āropetvā sammasati nāma.
anya-e0102n:1529_0: Āhārato ca ututo, kammato cāpi cittato;
anya-e0102n:1531_2: Iti yogāvacaro imehi ādānanikkhepehi ekaṃ vassasataṃ paricchinditvā saṅkhāresu tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1531_8: Yasmā pana uppannā saṅkhārā ṭhitiṃ pāpuṇanti,
anya-e0102n:1531_14: Yasmā ca “uppannā saṅkhārā ṭhitiṃ mā pāpuṇantu,
anya-e0102n:1531_16: jarappattā mā bhijjantū”ti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu kassaci vasavattibhāvo natthi,
anya-e0102n:1532_1: Evaṃ ādānanikkhepanavasena vassasataparicchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā tato paraṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1532_2: Tattha vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamo nāma vayavasena vuḍḍhassa vaḍḍhitassa rūpassa atthaṅgamo.
anya-e0102n:1533_1: So tameva vassasataṃ paṭhamavayena majjhimavayena pacchimavayenāti tīhi vayehi paricchindati.
anya-e0102n:1533_2: Tattha ādito tettiṃsa vassāni paṭhamavayo nāma.
anya-e0102n:1533_6: “paṭhamavaye pavattaṃ rūpaṃ majjhimavayaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1533_12: Majjhimavaye pavattarūpampi pacchimavayaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1533_14: Pacchimavaye tettiṃsa vassāni pavattarūpampi maraṇato paraṃ gamanasamatthaṃ nāma natthi,
anya-e0102n:1533_15: tasmā tampi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1534_1: Evaṃ paṭhamavayādivasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna “mandadasakaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1534_10: sayanadasaka”nti imesaṃ dasannaṃ dasakānaṃ vasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1535_0: Tattha dasakesu tāva vassasatajīvino puggalassa paṭhamāni dasa vassāni mandadasakaṃ nāma,
anya-e0102n:1535_1: tadā hi so mando hoti capalo kumārako.
anya-e0102n:1535_7: tadā hissa balañca thāmo ca vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0102n:1535_10: pakatiyā kira dubbalapaññassāpi tasmiṃ kāle appamattakā paññā uppajjatiyeva.
anya-e0102n:1535_14: tadā hissa attabhāvo purato pabbhāro hoti.
anya-e0102n:1535_16: tadā hissa attabhāvo naṅgalakoṭi viya vaṅko hoti.
anya-e0102n:1536_0: Tatrāyaṃ yogī etesaṃ dasakānaṃ vasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetuṃ iti paṭisañcikkhati –
anya-e0102n:1536_4: navamadasake pavattarūpaṃ dasamadasakaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1536_5: Dasamadasake pavattarūpaṃ punabbhavaṃ appatvā idheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1536_6: tasmā tampi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1537_1: Evaṃ dasakavasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna tadeva vassasataṃ pañcapañcavassavasena
anya-e0102n:1537_2: vīsatikoṭṭhāse katvā vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1537_4: “paṭhame vassapañcake pavattarūpaṃ dutiyaṃ vassapañcakaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1537_7: ekūnavīsatime vassapañcake pavattarūpaṃ vīsatimaṃ vassapañcakaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1537_8: Vīsatime vassapañcake pavattarūpaṃ maraṇato paraṃ gamanasamatthaṃ nāma natthi,
anya-e0102n:1538_0: Evaṃ vīsatikoṭṭhāsavasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna pañcavīsati koṭṭhāse katvā catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vassānaṃ vasena āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1538_1: Tato tettiṃsa koṭṭhāse katvā tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ vasena,
anya-e0102n:1538_2: paññāsa koṭṭhāse katvā dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ vassānaṃ vasena,
anya-e0102n:1538_4: Tato ekaṃ vassaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā vassānahemantagimhesu tīsu utūsu ekekautuvasena tasmiṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1539_1: “Vassāne catumāsaṃ pavattarūpaṃ hemantaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1539_2: Hemante pavattarūpaṃ gimhaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1539_3: Gimhe pavattarūpaṃ puna vassānaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1539_5: Evaṃ āropetvā puna ekaṃ vassaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā –
anya-e0102n:1539_6: “vassāne dvemāsaṃ pavattarūpaṃ saradaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1539_11: Gimhe pavattarūpaṃ puna vassānaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1539_12: tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tasmiṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1540_2: Juṇhe pavattarūpaṃ kāḷaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1540_6: Divasaṃ pavattarūpampi rattiṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1540_8: Tato tadeva rattindivaṃ pubbaṇhādivasena cha koṭṭhāse katvā –
anya-e0102n:1540_13: Majjhimayāme pavattarūpaṃ pacchimayāmaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1540_14: Pacchimayāme pavattarūpaṃ puna pubbaṇhaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1541_6: Samiñjane pavattarūpaṃ pasāraṇaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1542_0: Tato ekapadavāraṃ uddharaṇa atiharaṇavītiharaṇavossajjanasannikkhepanasannirumbhanavasena cha koṭṭhāse karoti.
anya-e0102n:1543_0: Tattha uddharaṇaṃ nāma pādassa bhūmito ukkhipanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1543_2: Vītiharaṇaṃ nāma khāṇukaṇṭakadīghajātiādīsu kiñcideva disvā ito cito ca pādasañcāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1543_5: Sannirumbhanaṃ nāma puna pāduddharaṇakāle pādassa pathaviyā saddhiṃ abhinippīḷanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1543_6: Tattha uddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
anya-e0102n:1543_9: Vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
anya-e0102n:1543_12: Evaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā tesaṃ vasena tasmiṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1544_4: sabbe te dhammā atiharaṇaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhanti,
anya-e0102n:1544_9: Sannikkhepane pavattā sannirumbhanaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhanti.
anya-e0102n:1544_10: Iti tattha tattha uppannā itaraṃ itaraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ appatvā tattha tattheva pabbaṃ pabbaṃ sandhi sandhi
anya-e0102n:1544_11: odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya taṭataṭāyantā saṅkhārā bhijjanti.
anya-e0102n:1544_13: Tassevaṃ pabbapabbagate saṅkhāre vipassato rūpasammasanaṃ sukhumaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1545_2: Eko kira dārutiṇukkādīsu kataparicayo adiṭṭhapubbapadīpo paccantavāsiko nagaramāgamma antarāpaṇe jalamānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1545_3: padīpaṃ disvā ekaṃ purisaṃ pucchi ambho “kiṃ nāmetaṃ evaṃ manāpa”nti?
anya-e0102n:1545_5: padīpo nāmesa telakkhayena vaṭṭikkhayena ca gatamaggopissa na paññāyissatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1545_7: imissā hi vaṭṭiyā anupubbena ḍayhamānāya tatiyabhāge tatiyabhāge jālā itarītaraṃ padesaṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1545_9: imissā hi aṅgulaṅgulantare aḍḍhaṅgulaḍḍhaṅgulantare tantumhi tantumhi aṃsumhi aṃsumhi jālā itarītaraṃ aṃsuṃ appatvāva nirujjhissati.
anya-e0102n:1545_10: Aṃsuṃ pana muñcitvā na sakkā jālaṃ paññāpetu”nti.
anya-e0102n:1546_0: Tattha “telakkhayena vaṭṭikkhayena ca padīpassa gatamaggopi na paññāyissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino
anya-e0102n:1546_2: “Vaṭṭiyā tatiyabhāge tatiyabhāge jālā itarītaraṃ padesaṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya
anya-e0102n:1546_4: “Aṅgulaṅgulantare jālā itarītaraṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino dasavassa pañcavassa
anya-e0102n:1546_5: catuvassa tivassa dvivassa ekavassa paricchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1546_6: “Aḍḍhaṅgulaḍḍhaṅgulantare jālā itarītaraṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino ekekautuvasena ekaṃ vassaṃ tidhā,
anya-e0102n:1546_9: “Tantumhi tantumhi jālā itarītaraṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino kāḷajuṇhavasena,
anya-e0102n:1546_11: ekarattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pubbaṇhādivasena ca paricchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1546_12: “Aṃsumhi aṃsumhi jālā itarītaraṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino abhikkamādivasena
anya-e0102n:1546_13: ceva uddharaṇādīsu ca ekekakoṭṭhāsavasena paricchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropananti.
anya-e0102n:1547_1: So evaṃ nānākārehi vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna tadeva rūpaṃ visaṅkharitvā āhāramayādivasena
anya-e0102n:1547_2: cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā ekekakoṭṭhāse tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1547_3: Tatrāssa āhāramayaṃ rūpaṃ chātasuhitavasena pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1547_4: Chātakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ hi jhattaṃ hoti kilantaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1547_6: aṅgārapacchiyaṃ nilīnakāko viya ca dubbaṇṇaṃ dussaṇṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1547_7: Suhitakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ dhātaṃ pīṇitaṃ mudu siniddhaṃ phassavantaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1547_8: So taṃ pariggahetvā “chātakāle pavattarūpaṃ suhitakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1547_9: Suhitakāle samuṭṭhitampi chātakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1547_10: tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1548_2: Uṇhakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ hi jhattaṃ hoti kilantaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1548_3: Sītautunā samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ dhātaṃ pīṇitaṃ siniddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1548_4: So taṃ pariggahetvā “uṇhakāle pavattarūpaṃ sītakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1548_5: Sītakāle pavattarūpaṃ uṇhakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1548_6: tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1549_3: upatthambhakāni pana tesaṃ utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānāni catuvīsatīti catupaṇṇāsa honti.
anya-e0102n:1549_5: Kāyadvāre kāyabhāvadasakavasena ceva utusamuṭṭhānādivasena ca catucattālīsa.
anya-e0102n:1549_6: Manodvāre hadayavatthukāyabhāvadasakavasena ceva utusamuṭṭhānādivasena ca catupaṇṇāsameva.
anya-e0102n:1550_0: So sabbampi taṃ rūpaṃ pariggahetvā “cakkhudvāre pavattarūpaṃ sotadvāraṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1550_4: Kāyadvāre pavattarūpaṃ manodvāraṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1550_5: tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1551_2: somanassitakāle uppannaṃ hi rūpaṃ siniddhaṃ mudu pīṇitaṃ phassavantaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1551_3: Domanassitakāle uppannaṃ jhattaṃ kilantaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1551_4: So taṃ pariggahetvā “somanassitakāle pavattarūpaṃ domanassitakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1551_5: Domanassitakāle pavattarūpaṃ somanassitakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1551_6: tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1552_0: Tassevaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ pariggahetvā tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropayato ayamattho pākaṭo hoti –
anya-e0102n:1553_0: Jīvitaṃ attabhāvo ca, sukhadukkhā ca kevalā;
anya-e0102n:1555_0: Cullāsīti sahassāni, kappaṃ tiṭṭhanti ye marū;
anya-e0102n:1556_0: Na tveva tepi tiṭṭhanti, dvīhi cittehi samohitā.
anya-e0102n:1557_0: Ye niruddhā marantassa, tiṭṭhamānassa vā idha;
anya-e0102n:1559_0: Anantarā ca ye bhaggā, ye ca bhaggā anāgate;
anya-e0102n:1569_1: Evaṃ āhāramayādīsu tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna dhammatārūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1570_7: Tato nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇakālato paṭṭhāya sabhāgarūpasantatimanuppabandhāpayamānaṃ saṃvaccharamattena paṇḍupalāsaṃ hutvā vaṇṭato chijjitvā patati.
anya-e0102n:1571_0: So taṃ pariggahetvā “tanurattakāle pavattarūpaṃ ghanarattakālaṃ appatvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1571_7: Paṇḍupalāsakāle pavattaṃ vaṇṭato chijjitvā patanakālaṃ appatvāva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1571_8: tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti,
anya-e0102n:1571_9: evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā iminā nayena sabbampi dhammatārūpaṃ sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1572_0: Evaṃ tāva rūpasattakavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1575_3: “ye ime ‘kesā aniccā dukkhā anattā’ti sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā,
anya-e0102n:1575_5: matthaluṅgaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā,
anya-e0102n:1575_6: sabbe te itarītaraṃ appatvā pabbaṃpabbaṃ odhiodhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya taṭataṭāyantā vinaṭṭhā,
anya-e0102n:1576_0: Ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ pana “heṭṭhā rūpasattake sattasu ṭhānesu ‘rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti pavattaṃ
anya-e0102n:1576_1: cittaṃ aparena cittena ‘aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti sammasanto ‘kalāpato sammasatī’ti” vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1577_1: Yamakatoti idha bhikkhu ādānanikkheparūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā tampi cittaṃ aparena cittena “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1577_5: dhammatārūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā tampi cittaṃ aparena cittena “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati.

anya-e0102n:1640_10: Tathā sesesupīti evaṃ gāhavasena samatiṃsa upakkilesā honti.
anya-e0102n:1640_11: Tesaṃ vasena akusalo abyatto yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu kampati vikkhipati.
anya-e0102n:1641_0: “Obhāse ceva ñāṇe ca, pītiyā ca vikampati;
anya-e0102n:1642_0: Passaddhiyā sukhe ceva, yehi cittaṃ pavedhati.
anya-e0102n:1646_1: Kusalo pana paṇḍito byatto buddhisampanno yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu uppannesu “ayaṃ kho me obhāso uppanno,
anya-e0102n:1646_2: so kho panāyaṃ anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo”ti iti vā taṃ paññāya paricchindati upaparikkhati.
anya-e0102n:1646_9: uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkho”ti sabbaṃ arūpasattake vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1647_6: Evaṃ samanupassanto obhāsādīsu na kampati na vedhati.
anya-e0102n:1649_0: Dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti, na ca vikkhepaṃ gacchatī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1650_0: So evaṃ vikkhepaṃ agacchanto taṃ samatiṃsavidhaṃ upakkilesajaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā obhāsādayo dhammā na maggo.
anya-e0102n:1650_1: Upakkilesavimuttaṃ pana vīthipaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggoti maggañca amaggañca vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1650_3: ayaṃ na maggo”ti maggañca amaggañca ñatvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1651_0: Ettāvatā ca pana tena tiṇṇaṃ saccānaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1651_1: Diṭṭhivisuddhiyaṃ tāva nāmarūpassa vavatthāpanena dukkhasaccassa vavatthānaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0102n:1651_3: Imissaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ sammāmaggassa avadhāraṇena maggasaccassa vavatthānaṃ katanti,
anya-e0102n:1651_4: evaṃ lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena tiṇṇaṃ saccānaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1658_1: Aṭṭhannaṃ pana ñāṇānaṃ vasena sikhāppattā vipassanā,
anya-e0102n:1658_12: Tasmā taṃ sampādetukāmena upakkilesavimuttaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā etesu ñāṇesu yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0102n:1659_3: Udayabbayañāṇaṃ hi heṭṭhā dasahi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ hutvā yāthāvasarasato tilakkhaṇaṃ sallakkhetuṃ nāsakkhi.
anya-e0102n:1660_1: Lakkhaṇāni pana kissa amanasikārā kena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhahanti?
anya-e0102n:1660_2: Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ tāva udayabbayānaṃ amanasikārā santatiyā paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1660_3: Dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa amanasikārā iriyāpathehi paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1660_4: Anattalakkhaṇaṃ nānādhātuvinibbhogassa amanasikārā ghanena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1660_5: Udayabbayampana pariggahetvā santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1660_6: Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1660_7: Nānādhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhoge kate anattalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1661_8: Uppādavayaññathattaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ hutvā abhāvasaṅkhāto vā ākāravikāro.
anya-e0102n:1662_0: “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato pana tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ dukkhaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:1663_0: “Yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti pana vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ anattā. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:1664_0: Tayidaṃ sabbampi ayaṃ yogāvacaro upakkilesavimuttena vīthipaṭipannavipassanāsaṅkhātena udayabbayānupassanāñāṇena yāthāvasarasato sallakkheti.
anya-e0102n:1667_1: Tassevaṃ sallakkhetvā punappunaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti rūpārūpadhamme tulayato tīrayato taṃ ñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ hutvā vahati,
anya-e0102n:1667_3: ñāṇe tikkhe vahante saṅkhāresu lahuṃ upaṭṭhahantesu uppādaṃ vā ṭhitiṃ vā pavattaṃ vā nimittaṃ vā na sampāpuṇāti.
anya-e0102n:1667_5: Tassa “evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ nāma saṅkhāragataṃ nirujjhatī”ti passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne bhaṅgānupassanaṃ nāma vipassanāñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1668_2: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhā tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassati.
anya-e0102n:1678_0: Tayo upaṭṭhāne kusalatā, nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1679_2: tena vuccati ‘ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇa”’nti.
anya-e0102n:1680_1: Tattha ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāti yaṃkiñci ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā,
anya-e0102n:1680_4: ārammaṇaṃ khayato vayato paṭisaṅkhāya uppannassa ñāṇassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassane yā paññā,
anya-e0102n:1680_6: Taṃ kathaṃ hotīti ayaṃ tāva kathetukamyatāpucchāya attho.
anya-e0102n:1681_0: Tattha rūpārammaṇatā cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjatīti rūpārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjati.
anya-e0102n:1681_1: Atha vā rūpārammaṇabhāve cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjatīti attho.
anya-e0102n:1681_2: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāti taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā,
anya-e0102n:1681_4: Tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassatīti yena cittena taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ khayato vayato diṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1681_5: tassa cittassa aparena cittena bhaṅgaṃ anupassatīti attho.
anya-e0102n:1682_0: Ettha ca anupassatīti anu anu passati,
anya-e0102n:1682_1: anekehi ākārehi punappunaṃ passatīti attho. Tenāha –
anya-e0102n:1683_0: Tattha yasmā bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭi,
anya-e0102n:1683_1: tasmā so bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccato anupassati,
anya-e0102n:1683_4: dukkhassa ca anattattā tadeva dukkhato anupassati,
anya-e0102n:1684_4: Tasmā etasmiṃ bhaṅgānupassanānusārena “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti diṭṭhe saṅkhāragate nibbindati,
anya-e0102n:1684_8: So evaṃ arajjanto lokikeneva tāva ñāṇena rāgaṃ nirodheti,
anya-e0102n:1685_0: Atha vā so evaṃ viratto yathā diṭṭhaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ,
anya-e0102n:1686_3: Ayampi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato,
anya-e0102n:1686_4: saṅkhatadosadassanena ca tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cāti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1686_5: Tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu yathāvuttena nayena kilese pariccajati,
anya-e0102n:1687_1: Idānissa tehi ñāṇehi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1687_2: taṃ dassetuṃ “aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1688_1: Gāthāsu pana vatthusaṅkamanāti rūpassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā puna yena cittena bhaṅgo diṭṭho,
anya-e0102n:1688_3: Paññāya ca vivaṭṭanāti udayaṃ pahāya vaye santiṭṭhanā.
anya-e0102n:1688_4: Āvajjanābalañcevāti rūpassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā puna bhaṅgārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgadassanatthaṃ anantarameva āvajjanasamatthatā.
anya-e0102n:1689_1: Ārammaṇaanvayena ubho ekavavatthanāti paccakkhato diṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa anvayena anugamanena yathā idaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1689_3: anāgatepi bhijjissatīti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ ekasabhāveneva vavatthāpananti attho.
anya-e0102n:1695_0: Nirodhe adhimuttatāti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ bhaṅgavasena ekavavatthānaṃ katvā tasmiññeva bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe
anya-e0102n:1695_1: adhimuttatā taggarutā tanninnatā tappoṇatā tappabbhāratāti attho.
anya-e0102n:1695_2: Vayalakkhaṇavipassanāti esā vayalakkhaṇavipassanā nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1696_2: Bhaṅgañca anupassatīti tassārammaṇassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassati.
anya-e0102n:1696_3: Suññato ca upaṭṭhānanti tassevaṃ bhaṅgaṃ anupassato “saṅkhārāva bhijjanti,
anya-e0102n:1696_5: na añño koci atthī”ti suññato upaṭṭhānaṃ ijjhati.
anya-e0102n:1702_0: Adhipaññāvipassanāti yā ca ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā yā ca bhaṅgānupassanā yañca suññato upaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1703_1: Kusalo tīsu anupassanāsūti aniccānupassanādīsu tīsu cheko bhikkhu.
anya-e0102n:1703_2: Catasso ca vipassanāsūti nibbidādīsu ca catūsu vipassanāsu.
anya-e0102n:1703_3: Tayo upaṭṭhāne kusalatāti khayato vayato suññatoti imasmiñca tividhe upaṭṭhāne kusalatāya.
anya-e0102n:1703_4: Nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatīti sassatadiṭṭhiādīsu nānappakārāsu diṭṭhīsu na vedhati.
anya-e0102n:1704_2: abhinnameva bhijjatī”ti pavattamanasikāro dubbalabhājanassa viya bhijjamānassa,
anya-e0102n:1704_4: tilānaṃ viya bhajjiyamānānaṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhitipavattanimittaṃ vissajjetvā bhedameva passati.
anya-e0102n:1704_5: So yathā nāma cakkhumā puriso pokkharaṇītīre vā nadītīre vā ṭhito thūlaphusitake deve vassante udakapiṭṭhe
anya-e0102n:1704_6: mahantamahantāni udakabubbuḷakāni uppajjitvā uppajjitvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bhijjamānāni passeyya,
anya-e0102n:1704_7: evameva sabbe saṅkhārā bhijjanti bhijjantīti passati.
anya-e0102n:1704_8: Evarūpaṃ hi yogāvacaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0102n:1706_0: Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1707_1: Tassevaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā bhijjanti bhijjantī”ti abhiṇhaṃ passato aṭṭhānisaṃsaparivāraṃ bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ balappattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1715_1: Tassevaṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ khayavayabhedanirodhārammaṇaṃ bhaṅgānupassanaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa
anya-e0102n:1715_2: sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu pabhedakā saṅkhārā sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassa sīhabyagghadīpiacchataracchayakkharakkhasacaṇḍagoṇacaṇḍakukkurapabhinnamadacaṇḍahatthighoraāsīvisaasanivicakkasusānaraṇabhūmijalitaaṅgārakāsuādayo
anya-e0102n:1715_6: anāgate nibbattanakasaṅkhārāpi evameva nirujjhissantī”ti passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ nāma uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1716_1: ekissā kira itthiyā tayo puttā rājaparādhikā,
anya-e0102n:1716_4: Athassā jeṭṭhaputtassa sīsaṃ chinditvā majjhimassa chindituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:1716_5: Sā jeṭṭhassa sīsaṃ chinnaṃ majjhimassa ca chijjamānaṃ disvā kaniṭṭhamhi ālayaṃ vissajji “ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1716_6: Tattha tassā itthiyā jeṭṭhaputtassa chinnasīsadassanaṃ viya yogino atītasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1716_8: “ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī”ti kaniṭṭhaputtamhi ālayavissajjanaṃ viya “anāgatepi nibbattanakasaṅkhārā
anya-e0102n:1716_10: Tassevaṃ passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne uppajjati bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1717_1: ekā kira pūtipajā itthī dasa dārake vijāyi.
anya-e0102n:1717_5: Sā nava dārake mate dasamañca mīyamānaṃ disvā kucchigate ālayaṃ vissajji “ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1717_6: Tattha tassā itthiyā navannaṃ dārakānaṃ maraṇānussaraṇaṃ viya yogino atītasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1717_7: hatthagatassa mīyamānabhāvadassanaṃ viya yogino paccuppannānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1717_9: Tassevaṃ passato etasmiṃ khaṇe uppajjati bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1718_6: Tasmā yathā nāma cakkhumā puriso nagaradvāre tisso aṅgārakāsuyo olokayamāno sayaṃ na bhāyati,
anya-e0102n:1718_9: Yathā vā pana cakkhumā puriso khadirasūlaṃ ayosūlaṃ suvaṇṇasūlanti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaṃ sūlattayaṃ olokayamāno sayaṃ na bhāyati,
anya-e0102n:1718_10: kevalaṃ hissa “ye ye imesu sūlesu nipatissanti,
anya-e0102n:1718_14: sūlattayasadisesu ca tīsu bhavesu “atītā saṅkhārā niruddhā,
anya-e0102n:1718_17: Yasmā panassa kevalaṃ sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatā saṅkhārā byasanāpannā sappaṭibhayā hutvā bhayato upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0102n:1719_0: Evaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhāne panassa ayaṃ pāḷi –
anya-e0102n:1720_4: Anattato manasikaroto nimittañca pavattañca bhayato upaṭṭhātī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1721_2: Aniccato manasikaronto hi saṅkhārānaṃ maraṇameva passati,
anya-e0102n:1721_5: Dukkhato manasikaronto hi sukhasammatāyapi pavattiyā abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanabhāvameva passati,
anya-e0102n:1721_7: Anattato manasikaronto pana ubhayampetaṃ suññagāmaṃ viya marīcigandhabbanagarādīni viya ca rittaṃ tucchaṃ suññaṃ assāmikaṃ apariṇāyakaṃ passati.
anya-e0102n:1721_8: Tenassa nimittañca pavattañca ubhayaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhātīti.
anya-e0102n:1724_1: Tassa taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu neva tāṇaṃ, na leṇaṃ, na gati,
anya-e0102n:1724_3: Sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatesu saṅkhāresu ekasaṅkhārepi patthanā vā parāmāso vā na hoti.
anya-e0102n:1724_10: nava ca sattāvāsā ekādasahi aggīhi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā viya ca,
anya-e0102n:1724_11: sabbe saṅkhārā gaṇḍabhūtā rogabhūtā sallabhūtā aghabhūtā ābādhabhūtā viya ca nirassādā nirasā mahāādīnavarāsibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0102n:1725_1: Sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassa ramaṇīyākārasaṇṭhitampi savāḷakamiva vanagahanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1725_9: Yathā hi so puriso etāni savāḷakavanagahanādīni āgamma bhīto saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto samantato ādīnavameva passati,
anya-e0102n:1725_10: evamevāyaṃ yogāvacaro bhaṅgānupassanāvasena sabbasaṅkhāresu bhayato upaṭṭhitesu samantato nirasaṃ nirassādaṃ ādīnavameva passati.
anya-e0102n:1725_11: Tassevaṃ passato ādīnavañāṇaṃ nāma uppannaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1726_1: Uppādo bhayanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1726_15: upāyāso bhayanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1727_2: upāyāso dukkhanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1728_2: upāyāso sāmisanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1729_2: upāyāso saṅkhārāti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1736_0: Dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kusalatā, nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1737_0: “Taṃ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ. Pajānanaṭṭhena paññā. Tena vuccati “bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n:1738_6: Gatīti yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti.
anya-e0102n:1738_8: Upapattīti “samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā”ti evaṃ vuttā vipākappavatti.
anya-e0102n:1738_11: Ettha ca uppādādayo pañceva ādīnavañāṇassa vatthuvasena vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1738_13: Nibbatti jātīti idañhi dvayaṃ uppādassa ceva paṭisandhiyā ca vevacanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1740_0: Āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ, ñāṇaṃ ādīnave ida”nti ca.
anya-e0102n:1742_0: Anuppādo khemanti santipade ñāṇantiādi pana ādīnavañāṇassa paṭipakkhañāṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1742_1: Bhayatupaṭṭhānena vā ādīnavaṃ disvā ubbiggahadayānaṃ abhayampi atthi khemaṃ nirādīnavanti assāsajananatthampi etaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1742_2: Yasmā vā panassa uppādādayo bhayato sūpaṭṭhitā honti,
anya-e0102n:1742_4: tasmā bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena siddhassa ādīnavañāṇassa ānisaṃsadassanatthampetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1743_5: Tasmā “uppādo dukkhanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1743_6: Evaṃ santepi bhayākārena dukkhākārena sāmisākārenāti evaṃ ākāranānattato pavattivasenevettha nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1744_0: Dasañāṇe pajānātīti ādīnavañāṇaṃ pajānanto uppādādivatthukāni pañca,
anya-e0102n:1744_1: anuppādādivatthukāni pañcāti dasa ñāṇāni pajānāti paṭivijjhati sacchikaroti.
anya-e0102n:1744_2: Dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kusalatāti ādīnavañāṇassa ceva santipadañāṇassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kusalatāya.
